(a) a {@item component pouch|phb} or (b) an {@item arcane focus|phb}
(a) a {@item scholar's pack|phb} or (b) a {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb}
{@item Hide armor|phb}, any {@filter simple weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon}, and two {@item dagger|phb|daggers}

classFeature.name: Apothecary Magic
entries: 你的奥术研究使你精通咒语。请参考核心规则中的一般咒语施放规则，以及本书中的《药剂师咒语列表》。

entries.name: Formula Book
entries: 你有一本书或笔记集，用来准备你的药剂师法术，发展你的神秘理论，记录你的神秘实践。
你可以将你的配方书作为你炼金术法术的奥术焦点。
您可以随意描述这本书。一些关于您书籍外观的例子包括：
- 一本大型的皮革书，黄色的页面用铁锁封闭（Iron Lock）
一堆零散的涂鸦笔记，用绳子松松地绑在一起。
- 一本完美无瑕的日记，边缘整齐，字迹优美
- 一个带有两个小金色锁的皮制公文包 (Leather Briefcase)
- 一只带有侧面手术符号的医疗包 (Medical Bag)
- 一个破旧的书包挂在一只肩膀上，口袋里露出各种小瓶和瓶子。
如果这本书被摧毁或丢失，你可以在一次长休期间使用墨水和纸重新创造它。

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: 你可以从药剂师法术清单中选择三个你喜欢的零级法术。
你可以在更高等级时选择学习额外的药剂师零级咒语，如药剂师表中的已知零级咒语栏所示。

entries.name: Elementary Reformulation
entries: 每当你完成一次长休并查阅你的配方书时，你可以用另一个来自药剂师法术清单的法术替换你已知的一个药剂师零级法术。

entries.name: Preparing and Casting Spells
entries: 药剂师表格显示了你可以用来施放1级至5级药剂师法术的法术位数量。
这张表还显示了这些法术槽的等级；你所有的法术槽都是相同等级的。
要施放你的1级或更高级别的药剂师法术，你必须消耗一个法术位。当你完成短休或长休时，你会恢复所有已消耗的法术位。
你准备了一份药剂师法术清单，可以从{@filter apothecary spell list|spells|class=Apothecary}中选择施放。
当你这样做时，选择与你的炼金术师等级相等的药剂师法术数量，这个数量等于你的智力调整值加上你的炼金术师等级（最少为一个法术）。
你准备的法术必须符合药剂师表中对应你等级的槽位等级列所显示的最高等级。
例如，如果你是一名5级药剂师，你有三个3级法术位。
拥有智力16，你准备的法术清单可以包括八个1级、2级或3级法术，任意组合。
要施放1级法术治疗伤口，你必须消耗其中一个法术位，并将其作为3级法术施放。
施放一个法术不会将其从你准备的法术列表中移除。
你可以在完成一次长休后更改你准备的法术清单。
准备一份新的药剂师法术清单，每个法术需要至少1分钟，每个法术等级。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: 智力是你作为炼金师法术的施法能力，因为你通过专注的学习和神秘知识来学习你的法术。
每当一个法术提到你的施法能力时，你使用你的智力。（Intelligence）
此外，当你施放一项药剂师法术并制定豁免 DC 时，以及使用一项法术进行攻击投掷时，你需要使用你的智力调整值。

entries.name: Ritual Casting
entries: 如果那个法术带有仪式标签并且你已经准备好了该法术，你可以将药剂师法术作为仪式施放。

entries.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: 你可以使用{@item arcane focus|PHB}作为你的药剂师法术的施法焦点。

classFeature.name: Occult Practice
entries: 在1级时，你选择其中一种神秘实践，这是你持续研究身体和精神的学科：异域学家(Alienist)，化学家(Chemist)，驱魔师(Exorcist)，变质学家(Mutagenist)，病原学家(Pathogenist)，或者复活者(Reanimator)。
你的选择在1级时会为你提供额外的熟练加点和扩展的法术列表，并在3级、6级、10级、14级和18级时提供额外的职业特性。

classFeature.name: Esoteric Theories
entries: 你发现了神秘理论，禁忌知识的碎片，可以用来增强你的魔法能力。
在2级时，你可以选择获得两个{@filter esoteric theories|optionalfeatures|source=SCGtD|Feature Type=ET}。你的理论选项将在课程描述的末尾详细说明。
当你获得特定药剂师等级时，你可以选择获得额外的理论，如药剂师表格中的已知理论列所示。
此外，当你在这个职业中升级时，你可以选择你所了解的理论之一，并用在那个等级可以学习的另一个理论来替换它。

classFeature.name: Occult Practice Feature
entries: 在3级时，你获得了你选择的专业（chosen discipline）赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到4级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与正常规则一样，使用此特性不能将能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取得一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Occult Practice Feature
entries: 在6级时，你获得了你选择的专业领域提供的一个特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与正常规则一样，使用此特性不能将能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取得一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Occult Practice Feature
entries: 在10级时，你获得了你选择的专业领域提供的一个特性。

classFeature.name: Greater Formula (6th level)
entries: 在11级时，你会发现一个被称为大师配方(Greater Formula)的魔法秘密。从药剂师法术清单中选择一个6级法术作为这个配方。
你可以施放你的大型配方一次，而不消耗法术位。在再次这样做之前，你必须完成一次长休。

entries.name: Master Reformulation
entries: 每当你完成一次长休并查阅你的配方书时，你可以用同级别的另一个药剂师法术替换你从这个特性获得的一个法术。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与通常一样，使用此特性时不能将能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取得一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Greater Formula (7th level)
entries: 在13级时，你会发现一个被称为(大师配方)的魔法秘密。选择一项来自药剂师法术清单的7级法术作为这个配方。

classFeature.name: Occult Practice Feature
entries: 在14级时，你获得了你选择的专业领域提供的一个特性。

classFeature.name: Greater Formula (8th level)
entries: 在15级时，你会发现一个被称为大师配方(Greater Formula)的魔法秘密。从药剂师法术列表中选择一个8级法术作为这个配方。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与正常规则一样，使用这个特性不能将一个能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取得一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Greater Formula (9th level)
entries: 在17级时，你会发现一个被称为大师配方(Greater Formula)的魔法秘密。从药剂师法术清单中选择一个9级法术作为这个配方。

classFeature.name: Occult Practice Feature
entries: 在18级时，你获得了你选择的专业领域提供的一个特性。

classFeature.name: Additional Greater Formula (6th level)
entries: 在19级时，你会发现一个名为大师配方(Greater Formula)的魔法秘密。选择另一个来自药剂师法术清单的6级法术作为这个配方。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与正常规则一样，使用这个特性不能将能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取得一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Additional Greater Formula (7th level)
entries: 在20级时，你会发现一个被称为更强大配方(Greater Formula)的魔法秘密。选择一项额外的第7级法术，从药剂师法术清单中作为这个配方。

classFeature.name: Miraculous Recovery
entries: 在20级时，你可以花费5分钟将力量注入与你的智力修正值相等数量的生物（包括你自己），以促进异常快速的恢复。
在这段时间里，你必须照顾生物，使用一个剩余至少一次使用的{@item Healer's Kit|PHB}。
目标恢复生命值，法术位，生命骰，以及其他能力，就像他们完成了一次长休息一样。
一个生物在24小时内只能从一个(奇迹恢复)中受益。
使用此功能后，直到完成一次长休才能再次使用。

optionalfeature.name: Acquired Tolerance
entries: 你对毒素的豁免检定获得优势，并且获得对毒素伤害的抗性。
此外，你对自己的药剂师法术的豁免检定自动成功，并且永远不会受到自己的药剂师法术造成的伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Adrenaline Surge
entries: 当一个生物在0点生命值时，如果它通过你使用药剂师法术位施放的法术恢复生命值，那么它将获得对所有伤害的抗性，并在其下一个回合结束前获得优势豁免。
它在下一回合进行的第一次攻击投掷中获得优势。

optionalfeature.name: Anatomical Precision
entries: 当你进行武器攻击时，你可以使用你的智力调整值，而不是力量或敏捷，用于攻击和伤害骰。

optionalfeature.name: Anesthesiology
entries: 你可以施放《定身术》(hold person) 而不消耗法术位或需要材料组件。
你必须在再次对同一生物使用这个理论之前完成一次长休。(long rest)

optionalfeature.name: Bedside Manner
entries: 你获得洞察力和说服技能的熟练加值。
你的熟练加值在使用这两项技能进行的任何能力检定中翻倍。

optionalfeature.name: Caustic Formulae
entries: 每回合一次，当你用药剂师法术对生物或物体造成伤害时，你可以消耗一个药剂师法术位，对目标造成额外2d4酸性伤害，再加上法术位等级的2d4伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Clinical Conditioning
entries: 你在体质豁免投掷上获得熟练加值。

optionalfeature.name: Combat Medic
entries: 你获得对武器和盾牌的熟练加值。

optionalfeature.name: Corrosive Compound
entries: 当你用你的药剂师法术造成毒素伤害时，你可以选择将法术伤害的一半作为毒素伤害，另一半作为酸性伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Cosmetic Surgery
entries: 你可以花费8小时对一只愿意的生物进行一项神秘手术程序，永久改变其外貌。
你可以决定这个生物的外貌，包括面部特征、声音、头发长度、颜色和独特特征，但它的游戏统计数据都不会改变。
你不能改变生物的大小，它的基本形状保持不变。
最终的转变是非魔法的，然而，可以通过强力恢复(`Greater Restoration`)法术或类似的魔法施加在生物身上，将其恢复到原始外貌。

optionalfeature.name: Critical Condition
entries: 当一个生物在对抗你的药剂师法术时的豁免投掷中掷出自然1，并且该法术造成伤害时，将该法术的所有伤害骰子都投掷两次并相加。
然后按照正常方式添加任何相关的修饰词，以确定生物从法术中受到的伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Diagnosis
entries: 你可以在你的回合中将帮助动作作为一个奖励动作。

optionalfeature.name: Doctor's Note
entries: 你可以随意使用发送法术。
你必须完成一次长休才能再次使用这个理论来联系同一个生物。(long rest)

optionalfeature.name: Double Dose
entries: 当你使用一个药剂师法术位施放一个针对单个生物并为其恢复生命值的药剂师法术时，你可以额外选择一个范围内的生物作为目标。

optionalfeature.name: Extracurricular Research
entries: 你可以从任意职业的法术列表中选择两个额外的零级法术。
这些cantrips对你来说变成了药剂师cantrips。

optionalfeature.name: Inoculation
entries: 你对死灵伤害具有抗性，且你的生命值上限不能被降低。
此外，你对疾病免疫。(Dungeons & Dragons)

optionalfeature.name: Interdisciplinary Practice
entries: 当你使用动作施放一个法术时，你可以将一次武器攻击作为一个奖励动作。

optionalfeature.name: Laboratory Assistant
entries: 你学会了法术《寻找伙伴》(find familiar)，并且始终准备着这个法术。
这不会计入你可以准备的药剂师法术数量。

optionalfeature.name: Liability Insurance
entries: 你可以在自己身上施放一次《应急措施》(contingency)，无需材料组件。
你必须完成一次长休才能再次这样做。

optionalfeature.name: Medical Expertise
entries: 你获得对医学和自然技能的熟练加成。
你的熟练加值在使用这两项技能进行的任何能力检定中翻倍。

optionalfeature.name: Medical Lexicon
entries: 你学习了六种你选择的语言。
你可以随意施展侦测毒药和疾病((detect poison and disease))。

optionalfeature.name: Nerve Agent
entries: 当你使用你的药剂师法术造成毒素伤害时，你可以选择改为造成心灵伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Noxious Blood
entries: 当一个生物在距离你5英尺内用近战攻击命中你时，它会受到毒素伤害，伤害值为1d6 + 你的体质调整值。

optionalfeature.name: Pharmacology
entries: 当你使用药剂师法术位或你的大师配方特性施放一个恢复生命值的法术时，该生物额外恢复的生命值等同于你的智力调整值。

optionalfeature.name: Physiological Analysis
entries: 如果你在战斗之外至少观察或与另一个生物互动1分钟，你可以了解关于它的生理特征的某些信息。
游戏主公开给你选择两项以下特征中的一项：
- 任意一项能力值
- 护甲等级 (Armor Class)
- 当前生命值 (Current hit points)
- 抗性（如有）
- 免疫（如有）
- 漏洞（如有）
或者，你可以花费1分钟观察一具尸体。
1分钟后，你确定了死因。

optionalfeature.name: Practical Resuscitation
entries: 当你施放一个唯一效果是让生物复活（但不是亡灵）的法术，比如(`raise dead`)，如果生物在过去的一小时内死亡，你施放该法术时不需要材料组件。

optionalfeature.name: Putrefaction
entries: 你的药剂师法术和能力无视不死生物对毒性伤害的抗性或免疫，以及对中毒状态的免疫。

optionalfeature.name: Rapid Response
entries: 当你施放一个药剂师法术，为一个生物恢复生命值时，在施放法术之前或之后，你可以移动你的速度而不会引发机会攻击。

optionalfeature.name: Routine Procedure
entries: 你可以随意施放次级恢复术，而无需消耗法术位。

optionalfeature.name: Stolen Secrets
entries: 你可以从任意职业的法术清单中学习一个法术。
它必须是你拥有药剂师法术位或更低级别的法术。
这个法术对你来说被视为一种药剂师法术，并不计入你所知道的药剂师法术数量。

optionalfeature.name: Subject Preparation
entries: 当你用近战武器攻击一个生物时，该生物在你的下一个回合结束前对你施放的药剂师法术的下一个豁免检定有劣势。

optionalfeature.name: Surgeon's Instinct
entries: 你拥有一种在10英尺范围内的盲视能力。

optionalfeature.name: Surgical Strikes
entries: 你可以在你的回合上采取攻击动作时，攻击两次，而不是一次。

optionalfeature.name: Toxicology
entries: 你可以在造成毒素伤害的法术的伤害骰中加上你的智力调整值。

optionalfeature.name: Triage
entries: 如果你还不会，你学会了《(Spare the Dying)》法术。
当你施放这个cantrip时，它的射程为60英尺。

optionalfeature.name: Unfailing Focus
entries: 当你在维持对一种药剂师法术的专注时，如果你未能通过一次体质豁免检定，你可以选择成功。
使用此功能后，直到完成短休或长休，你才能再次使用。

optionalfeature.name: Venomous Instruments
entries: 当你用武器攻击命中一名生物时，该生物会受到额外毒素伤害，数值等同于你的智力调整值。

optionalfeature.name: Virulence
entries: 当你在施放一项造成毒素伤害的药剂师法术时，如果伤害骰掷出了1，你可以重新投掷这个骰子。
即使新的骰结果是1，你也必须使用新的结果。

optionalfeature.name: Vital Signs
entries: 当你能看见的生物在你30英尺内失败了一次豁免投掷或死亡豁免投掷时，你可以使用你的反应将你的智力调整值加到该生物的投掷中，有可能将一个失败变成一个成功。
你必须在再次对同一生物使用这个理论之前完成一个短休息。

optionalfeature.name: Vivisection
entries: 你的武器攻击在19或20时造成暴击。(D&D)

subclassFeature.name: Alienist
entries: 一位异能学者寻求掌握心灵的奥秘。经过多年的研究大脑的内部运作，并解锁其潜在潜力，一位异能学者能够阅读和操纵他人的思维，并改变现实本身。他们利用从神秘学知识和奥秘知识中召唤的精神能量，进入难以理解的现实，并利用这些能量按照自己的意愿改变世界。

entries.name: Alienist Spells
entries: 在你达到特定等级时，你总是会准备一些特定的法术，就像《异邦法术》表格中所示。这些法术对你来说算作药剂师法术，但不会计入你准备的药剂师法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Advanced Psychology
entries: 你学会了{@spell eldritch blast}战斗法术。你获得了{@skill Arcana}技能的熟练。如果你已经精通这项技能，你可以选择另一项技能获得熟练。

subclassFeature.name: Mental Influence
entries: 你努力学习，解锁了你内心最深处的秘密，释放出自己内在的潜在心灵潜能。这种能量由心灵点数池表示。你有四个心灵点数。
你在6级时再获得两个，10级时再获得另外两个，14级时再获得两个，你可以消耗它们来使用下面详细描述的各种超能力。
如果你已经耗尽了所有的心灵能量点，你将无法使用这些能力。
完成短暂休息或长休息时，你会恢复所有已消耗的心灵点数。

items.name: Cerebral Breakthrough
entries: 当你施放一个造成伤害的药剂师法术时，你可以消耗一个（Psychic Point）来重新投掷任意数量的骰子。你必须使用新的点数。

items.name: Mind Over Matter
entries: 每当你受到伤害时，你可以使用你的反应并消耗一个（Psychic Point），将受到的伤害减少等同于你（apothecary）等级的数值。

items.name: Mind Whisperer
entries: 当你施放一个不造成伤害的药剂师法术时，你可以花费一个心灵点来施放它，而无需任何手势或口头组件。

subclassFeature.name: Metaphysical Tether
entries: 作为一个动作，你可以触摸一个愿意的生物，与其建立一个持续时间等于你药剂师等级的小时数的心灵联系，或者直到你结束这个联系（不需要动作）。
你可以同时拥有的最大链接数量等于你的熟练加值（proficiency bonus）数。
所有以这种方式捆绑的生物可以在彼此之间进行心灵感应交流，只要它们彼此之间的距离不超过100英尺。

subclassFeature.name: Force Manipulation
entries: 你的心灵力量使你能够控制周围现实的本质，让你能够违抗重力，仅凭意念推动自己在空中飞行。作为一个额外动作，你可以消耗一个心灵点，让自己在1分钟内获得与步行速度相同的飞行速度，期间可以悬停。

items.name: Prescribed Effects
entries: 每回合一次，当你施放的法术的目标（在你能看到的范围内，距离不超过30英尺）成功通过你施放的法术的智力、感知或魅力豁免检定时，你可以消耗一个（Psychic Point）来填充它的大脑，使其重新投掷d20，并使用较低的点数作为它的豁免检定，有可能将成功变为失败。

items.name: Mentally Prepared
entries: 每个回合一次，当你能看见的目标（包括你自己）在你30英尺内失败了一个智力、感知或魅力豁免扑，你可以使用一个（Psychic Point）并且将你的智力调整值加到该生物的豁免扑中，有可能将失败变成成功。

items.name: Fight or Flight Response
entries: 作为一个奖励动作，你可以消耗一个心灵点并传送到你能看到的一个未被占据的空间，最远距离为30英尺。你立即获得临时生命值，数值等同于你智力调整值的两倍。

subclassFeature.name: Self-Diagnosis
entries: 如果你没有剩余的心灵点数，你可以使用一个奖励动作并消耗一个法术位来恢复1d4心灵点数。

items.name: Careful Examination
entries: 每当你施放一个为生物恢复生命值的法术时，你可以消耗一个（Psychic Point）。如果你这样做，法术所选目标的所有生物额外恢复的生命值数量等于你智力调整值的两倍。

items.name: Enhanced Cerebellum
entries: 当你从异邦术士法术特性中施放任何1级或更高级的法术时，你可以像平常消耗一个法术位一样施放，或者消耗与该法术等级相等的心灵点数。

subclassFeature.name: Impenetrable Mind
entries: 你对精神伤害具有抵抗力，免疫于被 {@condition charmed} 或 {@condition frightened}。魔法无法让你入睡，你在抵抗那些试图读取你的思维或控制你思维或行动的法术时具有优势，比如支配人类。
此外，当你使用自我诊断功能通过一个法术位来恢复灵能点时，你现在会恢复与该法术等级相等的灵能点。

subclassFeature.name: Chemist
entries: 一位化学家是一位受过训练的科学家，他们对化合物进行了深入研究，使他们能够用炼金爆炸、毁灭性气体和其他可怕的混合物来恐吓敌人。化学家喜欢在实地测试他们的新化合物，并始终热衷于进一步推动他们的研究，寻找新的组合来燃烧他们的敌人。

entries.name: Chemist Spells
entries: 在你达到特定等级后，你总是有一些特定的法术准备好，就像在炼金师法术表中所示。这些法术对你来说算作药剂师法术，但不会计入你准备的药剂师法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Chemical Compound
entries: 如果你还没有炼金术工具的熟练度，你将获得这个熟练度。你还会学会火球术 cantrip 和从巫师法术清单中选择的另一个附魔 cantrip。这些 cantrip 对你来说算作药剂师 cantrip，但不会计入你已知的 cantrip 数量。

subclassFeature.name: Precise Application
entries: 当你施放一个对其他生物造成酸性、冰冷、火焰、闪电或毒素伤害的法术时，你可以选择数量等于你的智力调整值的生物。被选择的生物自动成功通过对该法术的豁免检定，并且如果他们通常在成功豁免后会受到一半伤害的话，他们将不会受到任何伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Chain Reaction
entries: 当你施放一个药剂师(cantrip)法术，通常只能以酸、冰、火、闪电或毒素伤害为目标的时候，这个法术可以选择改为以法术范围内的两个生物为目标。

subclassFeature.name: Chemical Conditioning
entries: 作为一个行动，你可以触摸一个生物（包括可能是你自己），使其对酸性、寒冷、火焰、闪电或毒素伤害获得抗性，持续1小时。如果你再次使用这个特性，这个效益会立即结束。

subclassFeature.name: Bottled Spells
entries: 你可以将你的炼金术法术特性中的一个法术存储为液体，放入一个小瓶或瓶子中，当你施放该法术时触碰它。
这个法术除了被储存在瓶子里之外没有任何效果。
这个法术会一直存储在瓶子里，直到有生物打开瓶子。
一旦你使用这个特性，之前创造的任何未使用的瓶装法术将变得无效，直到你完成一次短休才能再次瓶装另一个法术。
任何生物持有这个瓶子都可以花费一个动作来打开它并施放瓶内的咒语。
该法术使用你的法术命中加值和豁免 DC，但在其他方面，该法术将释放它的生物视为施法者。

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Adjustment
entries: 当你使用一位药剂师法术位施放一个法术，该法术造成以下列表中的一种伤害类型时，你可以将该伤害类型更改为其他列出的类型之一：酸(%num%), 冰冷(%num%), 火焰(%num%), 闪电(%num%), 或 毒素(%num%)。

subclassFeature.name: Chemical Cataclysm
entries: 当你使用药剂师法术位施放一个造成酸性、冰冷、火焰、闪电或毒素伤害的法术时，它被视为使用了一个7级法术位进行施放。

subclassFeature.name: Exorcist
entries: 一位驱魔师带着圣物、祈祷书和一袋仪式小玩意儿，准备好应对邪恶实体、阴险灵魂和可怕的恶魔。他们随时准备面对领域中最不自然和超自然的实体。

entries.caption: Exorcist Spells
rows: {@spell bless}, {@spell protection from evil and good}
{@spell dispel evil and good}, {@spell flame strike}

subclassFeature.name: Spiritual Study
entries: 你获得重甲和宗教技能的熟练加值。如果你已经具备这些熟练加值，你可以选择另一项技能来获得熟练加值。你可以使用圣徽作为你炼金术士法术的奥术焦点，并且你可以从牧师法术列表中选择一个法术零级咒语。对你而言，这个法术零级咒语算作炼金术士的法术零级咒语。

subclassFeature.name: Exorcism
entries: 在3级时，你获得了通过你的圣符号注入神圣能量的能力，以驱逐区域内的邪恶实体或清除它们对盟友的有害影响。
你可以使用这个特性的次数等于你熟练加值的一半（%num%）向下取整，你在短休或长休后会恢复所有已用次数。
从5级开始，当一个不死生物或邪恶生物在你的《(Expel Evil) 驱邪特性》的豁免检定中失败时，该生物遭受4d8点辐射伤害。

entries.name: Expel Evil
entries: 作为一个动作，你展示你的圣符并说出一段祈祷，谴责那些对你构成威胁的生物。在30英尺内的每个不死生物、天界生物、精灵或恶魔必须进行一次感知豁免投掷。如果失败，它将被驱散1分钟，或者直到它受到任何伤害。

entries.name: Purge Corruption
entries: 你触摸一个生物或物品，可以结束其身上的一个状态。如果一个生物被占据或被控制思维，你可以使用这个特性来移除与占据相关的任何特质。如果被占据，该生物会受到精神伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Sacred Vessel
entries: 你对受到惊恐状态免疫，无法被附身或诅咒，并且在豁免被魅惑效果时拥有优势。

subclassFeature.name: Negation
entries: 当敌对生物以盟友为目标时，你可以消耗一个药剂师法术位，迫使其进行一次魅力豁免检定。如果未通过检定，该行动失败，使用的资源则被浪费。

subclassFeature.name: Empowered Healing
entries: 每当你施放一个治疗生物的法术时，该法术提供最大治疗效果，而生物还会获得临时生命值，数值等同于你的药剂师等级。

subclassFeature.name: Devout Witness
entries: 作为虔诚的见证者，你代表你的神发言，并能感受到他们的力量在你体内涌动。对你的驱邪术未能通过豁免检定的生物会受到额外的辐射伤害，而那些受到净化腐化协助的生物会获得临时生命值。

subclassFeature.name: Mutagenist
entries: 变种学家们研究了一种血清，他们注射后可以变身为一个怪物形态。他们将自己作为这种力量的传导者，向敌人投掷自己，化身为一个庞大的畸形体。他们花费一生的时间研究和发现改进和修改血清的新方法，希望成为完美形态。

entries.name: Mutagenist Spells
entries: 在你达到特定等级后，你总是会预先准备好一些法术，就像《变质剂师法术》表格中所示。这些法术对你来说算作药剂师法术，但不会计入你准备的药剂师法术数量中。

subclassFeature.name: Natural Philosophy
entries: 你获得炼金工具和草药工具或毒药工具的熟练。你还获得对两种额外语言的熟练以及自然技能。如果你已经具备这种熟练，你可以选择获得另一种技能的熟练。

subclassFeature.name: Transmogrifying Elixir
entries: 作为一个奖励动作，你可以消耗一个法术位来进行一次怪诞的变身。变身在一分钟后结束，或者当你的生命值降至0或陷入无能为力状态时结束。当你进行这次变身时，你保持你的个性、阵营和游戏统计数据。然而，会发生一些变化：

items: 你的力量和智力属性分数被交换了。
你的体型变成大型，你的跳跃距离加倍，当确定你的携带能力和推、拉、举重量时，你被视为比实际体型大一级。
你的每只手都会变成一个又大又肉的拳头，你可以用它们进行近战武器攻击。对你而言，它们算作简单武器。你的大肉拳击中目标时造成1d10 + 你的力量调整值 + 你的药剂师等级的钝击伤害。
你不能施放或集中法术。
你拥有暗视能力，范围为120英尺。
你获得临时生命值，数值等同于你药剂师等级的五倍。
你也会根据你的药剂的效力增强你的能力。这与你用来进行转化的法术位级别有关：
你的速度每使用一个法术位等级增加5英尺。
你的护甲等级为13 + 使用的法术位等级。
在你的每个回合开始时，只要你至少还有1点生命值，你会恢复与所使用法术位等级相等的生命值。

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: 从6级开始，每当你在你的回合上采取攻击动作时，你将攻击两次，而不是一次。

subclassFeature.name: Potent Biology
entries: 当你处于变形形态时，你拥有更强大的攻击能力，可以绕过你敌人最强大的防御。
你的大块肉拳攻击被视为魔法攻击，可以克服对非魔法攻击和伤害的抗性和免疫。
当你用你的大块肉拳进行攻击时，你可以消耗一个法术位，用不自然的能量增强你的打击力量。当你以这种方式消耗一个法术位时，你每消耗一个法术位，额外造成1d8的力量伤害，每个法术位等级增加1d8伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Adaptive Genetics
entries: 你可以利用改变后的生物学来保护自己免受死亡的威胁。当你在自然状态或变形状态下的生命值降至0时，你的另一个自我会接管。

items: 当你以自然形态且生命值降至0时，你可以立即使用你的变形药剂特性，消耗一个法术位如常。当你这样做时，你恢复的生命值数量等同于你的药剂师等级（除了从变形中获得的临时生命值）。
当你在变形形态中被减至0点生命值时，你会恢复到你的自然形态，剩余1点生命值。如果如此做，你在完成短休或长休之前不能再次变形。

subclassFeature.name: Unnatural Evolution
entries: 你可以使用你的大型配方特性，变形时就好像你使用了相应等级的法术位。当你以这种方式转变时，你会获得以下附加的基因突变之一。

entries.name: Draconic Genome
entries: 你从背部长出肉质翅膀，皮肤呈现鳞片状外观。你获得一个与你步行速度相同的飞行速度，并且作为一个动作，可以向一个30英尺锥形区域喷射胆汁。该区域内的所有生物必须通过一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的体质豁免才能避免受到 8d6 酸性伤害，成功豁免的生物只受到一半伤害。一旦你使用了这个特性，你必须完成一次短休或长休才能再次使用。

entries.name: Giant Genome
entries: 你变成了一个庞大的肌肉和肉体的质量，将自己变成了一个活生生的攻城武器。
你的体型变成巨大(Huge)，对物体和建筑造成的所有伤害现在翻倍。
作为一个动作，你可以在你的回合消耗一个法术位，将你的拳头猛击地面，引发冲击波和碎石在你周围猛烈撞击。
你周围半径30英尺范围内的所有生物必须通过一次敏捷豁免检定，豁免 DC 为你的法术豁免 DC，否则它们将受到 8d6 钝击伤害并倒地。
如果他们在豁免投掷中成功，他们会受到一半伤害，并且不会被击倒。(saving throw)

entries.name: Cerebellum Genome
entries: 当你变形时，你保留了一部分思维，让你研究的痕迹停留在你的怪物大脑中。现在你有能力在变形的形态下保持对法术的集中。在变形状态下，你的集中不会因受到伤害而被打断。

subclassFeature.name: The New Flesh
entries: 你已经完善了你的变形药剂，突破了进化的限制，将你的形态推向你认为是进化的顶点。你在变形状态下获得以下好处：

items: 只要你还有一个或更多的生命值，你可以使用一个奖励动作并消耗一个法术位来恢复相当于所使用法术位等级的十倍的生命值。
如果你未能通过豁免投骰，你可以作为一次反应，消耗一个法术位来取得成功，而不是失败。
当变形时，你的力量得分变成与智力得分相等。此外，你可以在变形形态下施放法术。

subclassFeature.name: Pathogenist
entries: 疾病研究打开了许多危险的科学发现之门。作为既擅长清除身体疾病又了解传染病变异的专家，病原学家们将他们的研究带到战场上，利用怪物和敌人作为感染的试验对象。多年来，他们精心监测这些瘟疫的起因和影响，使他们成为疾病变异的专家，让他们的疾病以一种可怕的方式传播，并使他们的敌人饱受病症的折磨，削弱他们的身体，撼动他们的心灵。

entries.name: Pathogenist Spells
entries: 在你达到特定等级时，你总是会准备好一些特定的法术，就像《病原体学家法术》表中所示。这些法术对你来说算作药剂师法术，但不会计入你准备的药剂师法术数量中。

subclassFeature.name: Plague Proficiency
entries: 你学会了{@spell Chill Touch}的战斗法术。你获得草药工具包的熟练。如果你已经具备这种熟练，你可以选择另一种类型的工匠工具包获得熟练。

subclassFeature.name: Pernicious Pathogens
entries: 每当一个生物施放一个法术或使用一个特性或特征来治愈或移除你的疾病（比如施放{@spell lesser restoration}来移除你的{@spell infect|SCGtD}法术），该生物必须首先进行一次能力检定，使用它的施法能力值（如果法术或特殊能力没有指定施法能力值，则使用它的魅力调整值）。检定 DC 等同于你的法术豁免 DC。
在失败的检定中，生物的法术、特性或特征失败且无效果。使用的任何材料组件都会消耗掉，消耗的任何法术位都会被浪费。

subclassFeature.name: Mutant Strain
entries: 你可以进化你的疾病，引起新的症状。你学会两种自选的突变菌株，每次你在这个职业中获得一个等级时，你可以用这个特性中的另一种不同的突变菌株替换你已知的一种突变菌株。当你在这个职业中达到一定等级时，你会学到额外的突变菌株，如突变菌株已知表所示。
每当你施放一个施加疾病效果的法术（比如{@spell infect|SCGtD}或{@spell contagion|SCGtD}），你可以将你的变种菌株的额外效果应用于该法术的一个目标，该效果持续该法术的持续时间。
当你学习一种突变菌株时，以下突变菌株可供选择。如果一种菌株有等级要求，你必须至少达到该职业的等级才能学习该菌株。

items.name: Dizziness
entries: 目标无法进行反应。

items.name: Fatigue
entries: 每当目标对你的疾病豁免检定失败时，其速度将减少至5英尺，直到其下一个回合开始。

items.name: Coughing Fits
entries: 在目标的每个回合开始时，它必须根据你的法术豁免 DC 进行一次体质豁免检定。未通过豁免检定的话，目标将无法说话，直到其下一个回合开始。

items.name: Shivers
entries: 目标不受控制地颤抖着。在每个目标回合开始时，它会掉落它手中的任何物品。

items.name: Weakness (9th level)
entries: 目标使用近战武器攻击时造成一半的伤害。

items.name: Dry Eyes (9th level)
entries: 每当目标对你的疾病豁免检定失败时，它将在下一个回合开始前失明。

items.name: Intense Fever (9th level)
entries: 目标无法恢复生命值。

items.name: Lesions (9th level)
entries: 目标失去任何伤害抗性。

items.name: Nausea (15th level)
entries: 每当目标未能通过你的疾病豁免检定时，它将在其下一个回合开始前陷入无力状态。

items.name: Dystrophy (15th level)
entries: 目标变得容易受到钝击、刺击和挥砍伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Breakthrough Infection
entries: 当你使用药剂师法术位或你的大师配方（Greater Formula）特性施放一个引起疾病的法术时，该法术会无视任何生物对疾病的免疫。这样的生物反而会以优势进行对抗你的疾病的豁免投掷。

subclassFeature.name: Outbreak
entries: 当一个生物死于你的疾病感染时，你可以使用你的反应将这种疾病传播给你能看见的另一个生物，距离不超过30英尺。

subclassFeature.name: Insidious Incubation
entries: 当你开始施放{@spell infect|SCGtD}时，你可以修改它，使其不需要集中精神。如果你这样做，该法术的持续时间在那次施法中变为1分钟。在再次使用此特性之前，你必须完成一次短休或长休。

subclassFeature.name: Immunocompromised
entries: 被你的疾病之一（如{@spell infect|SCGtD}或{@spell contagion}）感染的生物，在面对你的药剂师法术时，对豁免投掷有劣势。

subclassFeature.name: Rapid Evolution
entries: 每当你施放一个施加疾病的法术时，你可以将你的突变菌株的两个额外效果应用于法术的一个目标，而不是一个。

subclassFeature.name: Reanimator
entries: 一个复活师是生死的主宰。花费多年时间完善他们的配方，将新近死去的人复活，或者用被丢弃的肉体和拼凑的解剖构造新生命，这些让大多数复活师不断徘徊在天才和疯狂之间。复活师的技能在死亡的咽喉中抓住生命，使他们极其适合处理死亡和不死之事。他们疯狂的天才通过用敌人留下的残缺身体部分构造出的生物来展现，这些生物会在他们的命令下冲向战场。

entries.name: Reanimator Spells
entries: 在你达到特定等级后，你总是会准备好一些特定的法术，就像在《复活者法术》表中所示。这些法术对你来说算作药剂师法术，但不会计入你准备的药剂师法术数量中。

subclassFeature.name: Spark of Life
entries: 你学会了{@spell shocking grasp}和{@spell spare the dying}的零级咒语。这些对你来说算作药剂师咒语，不计入你所知道的药剂师零级咒语的数量。

subclassFeature.name: Corpsewrought Creature
entries: 你用拾来的尸体部件构建了一个伙伴，并用你的神秘魔法让它复活：一个{@creature corpsewrought creature|SCGtD}。
这个生物对你和你的同伴友好，并且会听从你的命令。请查看附带的{@creature corpsewrought creature|SCGtD}属性块中的游戏统计数据，其中在几个地方使用了你的熟练加值（PB）。
你可以确定生物的外观特征；你的选择不会影响其游戏统计数据。
在战斗中，该生物与你共享先攻值，但它会在你之后立即行动。
它可以自行移动并使用自己的反应，但它在自己的回合中所采取的唯一行动是躲闪动作，除非你在你的回合中采取一个额外动作来命令它采取另一个行动。
该动作可以是其属性块中的一个动作，也可以是其他动作。
如果你无力行动，该生物可以选择任何动作，而不仅仅是躲闪动作。
如果你的尸魂生物在过去的一小时内死亡，你可以使用你的治疗工具包作为一个动作来复活它，前提是你与它在5英尺内，并且你消耗了一个药剂师法术位。
尸魂同伴在1分钟后以其所有生命值恢复的状态复活。
在一次长休结束时，如果你携带着你的医疗包并且有合适的"材料"，你可以创造一个新的尸魂生物。
如果你已经拥有一个来自这个特性的尸魔生物，第一个立即死亡。
如果你死亡，这个生物也会灭亡。

subclassFeature.name: Bodyguard
entries: 当一个生物在你的尸魂生物的5英尺范围内对你发动攻击时，它可以使用其反应对这个攻击者进行一次近战武器攻击。
此外，你的尸魔生物的重击攻击被视为魔法攻击，以克服对非魔法攻击和伤害的抗性和免疫。
另外，你可以使用药剂师法术位施放一次《(%Animate Dead)》。一旦施放，你必须完成一次长休才能再次施放该法术。

subclassFeature.name: Reanimated Head
entries: 你已经复活了一个死亡人形生物的头颅，现在它为你服务于学习之中。你可以使用这个头颅作为施法焦点。这个头颅会说通用语和你选择的另一种语言。
每当你进行一个让你可以加上熟练加值的智力检定时，你可以将骰子点数为9或更低的d20骰结果视为10。此外，你会获得对奥术学和侦查技能的熟练加值。
你可以使用头颅施放与死者交谈，而无需消耗法术位。一旦你使用了这个特性，你必须完成一次短休或长休才能再次使用。

subclassFeature.name: Behold, My Creation
entries: 你的尸体铸造生物的体型增加到大型，并且速度增加到40尺。
当你的尸体锻造生物用近战攻击命中一名生物时，它可以立即对目标发起一次擒抱尝试。
要摆脱这个搏斗，DC等于8 + 尸魂生物的力量调整值(+4) + 你的PB。

subclassFeature.name: Berserk Fury
entries: 当你命令你的尸铸生物采取攻击动作时，该生物可以进行两次攻击。

subclassFeature.name: I Can't Stop The Monster I Created
entries: 你的尸体铸造生物增加到巨大尺寸，获得10英尺的攻击范围，速度增加到50英尺。它的猛击攻击额外造成1d8点钝击伤害。
此外，你的尸魂生物可以推动或举起的重量加倍。

subclassFeature.name: Path of the Haze Rager
entries: The first warriors who ventured into Drakkenheim were doomed. Few returned from these early expeditions, and those few who survived were forever changed by the experience. A rare few wrestle the madness of the Haze through a supernatural rage which allows them to channel the eldritch energies of delerium. These Haze Ragers thrive on the contaminated power of delerium, transforming madness and fear into a weapon. Their practice has given them unnatural tolerance for contamination, and some have told legends of these barbarians surviving even the most horrific mutations.

subclassFeature.name: Contaminated Fury
entries: Starting when you choose this path at 3rd level, you can channel contaminated fury into your weapon strikes. Once per turn while you are {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian||1||raging}, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d8|necrotic} necrotic damage to a target you hit with one of your weapon attacks unarmed strikes. This extra damage increases at {@damage 2d8} when you reach 10th level, and to {@damage 3d8} when you reach 14th level.

In addition, you can draw contamination into yourself to empower your melee weapon attacks further. When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can choose to give yourself one or more levels of contamination to deal necrotic damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is {@damage 2d8} for each level of contamination you choose to gain.

subclassFeature.name: Inured to Corruption
entries: If a spell, such as purge contamination, has the sole effect of removing Contamination Levels from you, the caster doesn't need material components to cast the spell on you. In addition, if the spell would normally cause you to gain exhaustion, you don't gain exhaustion from the spell.

subclassFeature.name: Octarine Blood
entries: You gain resistance to necrotic, poison, psychic, and radiant damage, and your hit point maximum can't be reduced.

subclassFeature.name: Already a Monster
entries: While you are {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian||1||raging}, you ignore the Symptoms of any Contamination Levels you have gained, except for a Monstrous Transformation.
Whenever you would suffer a Mutation from contamination, you can roll twice and choose which Mutation you gain.

subclassFeature.name: Consume Corruption
entries: You gain the ability to cast the {@spell Purge Contamination|SCGtD} spell. You can do so a number of times per day equal to your proficiency bonus. You do not need material components when casting the spell in this way. You can't use this ability on yourself.

subclassFeature.name: Voices In Your Head
entries: Once per day you can cast the {@spell contact other plane|PHB} spell. If you fail the Intelligence saving throw, you can choose to gain one Contamination Level instead of being driven mad.

subclassFeature.name: One with the Mists
entries: You can cast {@spell gaseous form|PHB} on yourself. You can do so a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses of this feature when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Breath of the Haze
entries: When you enter your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian||1||rage}, you surround the area around yourself with a manifestation of the Haze filled with maddening whispers. Mists swirl about you in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on you, which moves with you. The area within the mists is lightly obscured. Creatures who begin their turn in the mists must make an Intelligence saving throw. The save DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier. A creature who fails this saving throw takes {@damage 3d8} psychic damage and has its speed halved. Additionally, they cannot take reactions until the start of their next turn. When you manifest the mists, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected.

subclassFeature.name: Path of the Old Gods
entries: These barbarians consider themselves natural weapons, born of the gods to stand against the enemies of their chosen deity. The Old Gods represent raw power, the untamed wild, and traditional worship. A barbarian who follows the Old Gods is often close to nature, and sees glorious battle as the arena of their gods, and their purpose is to destroy the enemies of their chosen god.

subclassFeature.name: Brute Strength
entries: You are relentless in battle, filled with a bloodlust and rage of the Old Gods. You are proficient with improvised weapons. Your unarmed strike and attacks with any melee weapons or improvised weapons that aren't light deal damage equal to 1d12 plus your Strength modifier.
While you are {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian||1||raging}, you gian the following benefits:

items: All melee weapons you wield that aren't light gain the heavy and thrown properties, including improvised weapons. A weapon which doesn't specify a thrown range gains a range of 30/60 while you are wielding it.
Once on your turn when you hit a creature within 5 feet of you with a melee weapon attack, you can try to grapple or shove that creature as part of the same attack.
If your size is Small, you don't have disadvantage on attack rolls when wielding a heavy weapon.

subclassFeature.name: Imbued by the Gods
entries: Your natural strength is amplified, and the gods you worship bestow upon you inhuman capabilities:

items: You gain proficiency in Intimidation if you don't already have it, and add twice your proficiency bonus to Intimidation checks.
You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift. Your long jump and high jump are doubled.

subclassFeature.name: Adaptable Combatant
entries: You gain a climb speed equal to your walking speed. Additionally, your ability to grab enemies and turn anything into a weapon grows stronger. You gain the following benefits:

items: You can try to grapple or shove a creature up to two size categories larger than you.
Your speed is no longer halved when you try to move a creature you're grappling.
Your unarmed strikes and attacks with improvised weapons count as magical for the purposes of overcoming resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

You can treat a creature you are grappling as an improvised weapon. When you hit another target using a grappled creature as an improvised weapon, the grappled creature takes damage equal to your Strength modifier plus your proficiency bonus. When you use a creature as an improvised weapon, thrown attacks made with it have a range of 10/20 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Sturdy Build
entries: Whenever you enter your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian||1||rage} or willingly end your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian||1||rage} on your turn, you can expend Hit Dice and regain hit points as if you had finished a short rest.

subclassFeature.name: Brutal Kills
entries: While you are {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian||1||raging}, if you reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can choose to kill them brutally, tearing off limbs, and savaging your enemy. The violent display terrifies those around you.
Any enemies that can see you must make a successful Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you for the next minute. The save DC is 8 + your proficiency bonus + your strength modifier
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest you can do so again.

subclassFeature.name: Gift of the Old Gods
entries: The Old Gods have chosen you as their divine weapon, a tool to be used against evil. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you are raging, you can attack three times whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
You can grapple or shove any creature, regardless of size.
You can add your Strength score to the range of all thrown weapons.
When you shove a creature, you can push it 10 feet.

subclassFeature.name: College of Doomsayers
entries: Bards of this college revel in the fear and despair of others. They have foreseen the end of times, and use their gifts of prophecy to instill terror in those who hear their words. These bards command an audience like any other, but their craft is that of a mad prophet, and their poems and songs echo dissonant rattlings of hopelessness and suffering. Those who hear the mad ramblings are stricken with fear, lose their wills, and fall into madness.

subclassFeature.name: The End is Nigh
entries: Your words strike fear into the hearts of those who bear witness to your doomsaying. Whenever you make a Charisma (Intimidation) check, you may treat any roll of 9 or lower as if you had rolled a 10.

subclassFeature.name: Dreadful Words
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration and choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target takes psychic damage equal to the roll of your Bardic inspiration die and must make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes frightened of you until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Prophetic Foresight
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration and choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target takes psychic damage equal to the roll of your Bardic inspiration die and must make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes frightened of you until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: True Believer
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration and choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target takes psychic damage equal to the roll of your Bardic inspiration die and must make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes frightened of you until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Impending Doom
entries: A creature frightened of you has disadvantage on all saving throws it makes while it can see you.

subclassFeature.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
entries: When you roll initiative, you may choose a target within 60 feet of you that you can see. You foretell that creature's immediate demise. During the first round of combat, any attacks against that creature have advantage.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Domain
entries: Clerics of the Sacred Flame know that life is at all times a balance between the light and the dark. Most clerics uphold the flame, whose divine purpose is to hold back the darkness, and offer guidance to those who pass on. Clerics of the Shadow Domain are in tune with the dark side of the divine. They stand to balance all things, practicing the powers of shadow against their enemies. They know that not all deserve the light, and so sending foul horrors to the shadows is their form of righteous justice.

subclassFeature.name: Domain Spells
entries: Clerics of the Sacred Flame know that life is at all times a balance between the light and the dark. Most clerics uphold the flame, whose divine purpose is to hold back the darkness, and offer guidance to those who pass on. Clerics of the Shadow Domain are in tune with the dark side of the divine. They stand to balance all things, practicing the powers of shadow against their enemies. They know that not all deserve the light, and so sending foul horrors to the shadows is their form of righteous justice.
You gain domain spells at the cleric levels listed in the Shadow Domain Spells table. See the Divine Domain class feature for how domain spells work.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Cantrips
entries: You learn the {@spell chill touch} and {@spell minor illusion} cantrips. These cantrips count as cleric spells for you, and don't count against the number of cleric cantrips you know.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Sight
entries: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, out to a distance of 300 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Cloak of the Night
entries: You can use your Channel Divinity to invoke protective shadows.

As an action, you draw upon a curtain of magical shadow which lasts for 1 minute. When you do, choose one creature you can see within 60 feet of you to be enveloped by the cloak of the night (which can be yourself). While the cloak lasts, that creature has resistance to all damage while it is in dim light or darkness.

In addition, when you draw the cloak of night, all nonmagical light sources within 60 feet of you become extinguished. Magical light sources are dispelled if they were created by a spell with a level equal to or lower than your proficiency bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Shifting Shadows
entries: You can twist shadow around other creatures to pull them through space.

As an action, you can target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you that is in dim light or darkness. You teleport that creature up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space of your choice you can see that is also in dim light or darkness. The chosen space must be on a surface or in a liquid that can support the target without the target having to squeeze. An unwilling creature that succeeds on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC is unaffected.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Spellcasting
entries: You can add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Reborn in Darkness
entries: You regain 10 hit points at the start of each of your turns while you are in darkness. If you take radiant damage, this regeneration doesn't function until the start of your next turn. You only die if you do not regenerate on your turn. Additionally, you do not age while you are in darkness.

subclassFeature.name: Circle of Contamination
entries: As druids are often in tune with nature and the natural order, most see delerium as a scourge upon the world. However, a rare few see the truth: the eldritch stones are an essential part of the natural order, one which works at a cosmic scale. Druids of the Circle of Contamination use the blighted rocks and contaminating Haze as a conduit for supernatural evolution. They have embraced the chaotic power of Delerium as an extension of the inherent chaos in the natural order, spreading the Haze while wielding it as a powerful ally to fuel their spells.
At 2nd level, you learn the chill touch and poison needle* cantrips. These don't count against the number of druid cantrips you know.

At 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th level you gain access to the spells listed for that level in the Circle of Contamination Spells table. Once you gain access to one of these spells, you always have it prepared, and it doesn't count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. If you gain access to a spell that doesn't appear on the druid spell list, the spell is nonetheless a druid spell for you.

subclassFeature.name: Blighted Magic
entries: Your magic becomes a twisted mockery of druidic principles, and you can twist your spells to suit your needs. Your spells which conjure creatures or natural flora and fauna now appear like sickly, fleshy tentacles, and animals you summon are cancerous and mutated. In addition, when you cast a spell, you can choose one of the following blighted magic options:

items: {@bold Twin Spell.} If the spell you cast targets only one creature and doesn't have a range of self, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to target a second creature in range with the same spell. To be eligible, a spell must be incapable of targeting more than one creature at the spell's current level.
{@bold Quicken Spell.} When you cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to cast the spell as a bonus action.

{@bold Corrupt Spell.} When you roll damage for a spell, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to change the damage type of all damage caused by the spell to necrotic. In addition, you can reroll a number of the damage dice up to your Wisdom modifier (minimum one). You must use the new rolls
{@bold Purify Spell.} When you cast a contaminated spell (found in Chapter 4), you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to cast the spell without gaining a Contamination Level.

subclassFeature.name: Despoiler
entries: You gain resistance to poison and necrotic damage.

subclassFeature.name: Cycle of Contamination
entries: Though your magic is infused with contaminated power, you have also learned ways to effectively expel these energies. You can cast the {@spell purge contamination|SCGtD} spell as an action without expending a spell slot. You don't need to provide the material components when you cast the spell in this way, and the target does not gain any exhaustion levels from this casting of the spell. When you cast {@spell purge contamination|SCGtD} in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Draw Corruption
entries: You gain the ability to draw contamination into yourself to empower your magic. Once per turn as a bonus action, you can gain one Contamination Level. If you do, you regain one use of your Wild Shape feature.

subclassFeature.name: Defile Elements
entries: You learn the {@spell summon delerium elemental|SCGtD} spell, and always have this spell prepared (it doesn't count against the number of druid spells you can prepare). You can cast it once without a spell slot, material component, or gaining a contamination level, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you cast the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn't require concentration. When you do, the spell's duration for that casting changes to 1 minute.

subclassFeature.name: Haze Aura
entries: You have become such a locus for contamination that you project the Haze around your body. The aura persists so long as you are not incapacitated. Creatures of your choice which start their turn within 10 feet of you must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. Those who fail the save take 3d6 necrotic damage. A creature who fails this saving throw by 5 or more gains one Contamination Level.
A creature which makes a successful saving throw against your Haze Aura is immune to its effects for 24 hours.

subclassFeature.name: Groomed for Leadership
entries: You gain proficiency in the History and Persuasion skills if you don't already have it. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of those proficiencies.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Commands
entries: You can issue a battle command as a bonus action to an ally within 120 feet of you who can hear you. Choose one of the following commands:

items: {@bold Fight On!} The target regains a number of hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. The creature can't regain hit points from this command again until it finishes a short or long rest.
{@bold For Glory!} The target can use their reaction to make a melee or ranged weapon attack.
{@bold Move It!} The target can use their reaction to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
{@bold Never Falter!} The target recovers from one charmed or frightened condition. Once a creature benefits from this command, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Fearless Commander
entries: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws, and you have advantage on saving throws against effects which charm or frighten you.

subclassFeature.name: Coordinated Command
entries: When you issue a battle command on your turn, you can target two allies instead of one. You can give both the same command or a different command to each ally. Both targets must be within 120 feet of you.

subclassFeature.name: Adaptive Strategy
entries: When you issue a battle command, the targets gain advantage on their next attack roll or saving throw they make before the end of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Call to Action
entries: At 18th level, when you use your Action Surge ability, instead of taking an additional action yourself, one ally you can see can immediately take an additional turn immediately after you finish your turn.

subclassFeature.name: Way of the Arcane Hand
entries: Monks who practice the Way of the Arcane Hand have trained their bodies and souls to be attuned to the weave of arcane magic. They can harness those cosmic energies and use them to fuel their martial practices. Monks of this tradition, although not mageborn, have gained control over the rawest and most natural forms of power.

subclassFeature.name: Erudite Education
entries: You gain proficiency in the Arcana skill. Whenever you make an Intelligence ability check, you gain a bonus to the check equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1)

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: When you reach 3rd level, you gain the ability to cast spells. See Spell Rules for the general rules of spellcasting and the Spells Listing for the wizard spell list.

entries.name: Arcane Focus
entries: You can use a monk weapon as an arcane focus for your spellcasting.

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the wizard spell list. You learn an additional wizard cantrip of your choice at 10th level.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: The Way of the Arcane Hand Spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your wizard spells of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.
For example, if you know the 1st-level spell thunderwave and have a 1st-level and a 2nd-level spell slot available, you can cast thunderwave using either slot.

entries.name: Spell Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: You know three 1st-level wizard spells of your choice.

The Spells Known column of the Way of the Arcane Hand Spellcasting table shows when you learn more wizard spells of 1st level or higher of a level for which you have spell slots. For instance, when you reach 7th level in this class, you can learn one new spell of 1st or 2nd level.

Whenever you gain a level in this class, you can replace one of the wizard spells you know with another spell of your choice from the wizard spell list. The new spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your wizard spells, since you learn your spells through contemplation and meditation. You use your Wisdom whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Wisdom modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a wizard spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.
{@bold Spell save DC} = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier
{@bold Spell attack modifier} = your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier

subclassFeature.name: Eldritch Flurry
entries: Whenever you take the Attack action on your turn, you can cast one of your cantrips in place of one of those attacks.

When you use your Flurry of Blows, you can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action as a bonus action instead of making unarmed strikes. Finally, when you use your action to cast a spell, you may treat this as taking an attack with a monk weapon for the purposes of your other monk features.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Empowerment
entries: While you are concentrating on a spell, you add twice the spell's level to the damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and attacks made with monk weapons.

subclassFeature.name: Focus Power
entries: When you cast a spell, you can expend ki points to increase the level of the spell as if you'd cast the spell using a higherlevel spell slot. You must use a spell slot as normal to cast the spell, then expend 1 ki point for each level you increase the spell in this way. You can increase the spell's level higher than your highest-level spell slot to a maximum level equal to your proficiency bonus.

For example, if you're an 11th-level Way of the Arcane Hand monk, when you cast the spell scorching ray using a 2nd-level spell slot, you could expend 2 ki points to cast the spell as 4th-level spell.

subclassFeature.name: Spell Resistance
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects. Furthermore, you have resistance to damage from spells and magical effects.

subclassFeature.name: Meditative Casting
entries: Starting at 17th level, when you cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action that requires your concentration, you can expend ki points equal to the spell's level to modify the spell so that it does not require your concentration. Instead, the spell lasts up to 1 minute, or its maximum duration, whichever is shorter.

subclassFeature.name: Way of the Serpent
entries: Master of the spear, this nimble warrior uses polearms not only as a weapon, but as an extension of themselves, using their weapon to amplify mobility, maneuverability, and combat. Like a snake in the grass, the Way of the Serpent hones one's ability to predict oncoming attacks, deflect from a distance, and strike with deadly precision.

subclassFeature.name: Serpent Style
entries: You gain proficiency with the glaive, halberd, pike, trident, and similar spears and polearms. These weapons count as monk weapons for you, even if they have the heavy or two-handed properties. Furthermore, your grace and mastery of these weapons does not limit your ability to make unarmed strikes while wielding a two-handed weapon.
While wielding a quarterstaff, spear, or trident in two hands, that weapon gains the Reach property.

subclassFeature.name: Serpent Spring
entries: You can use polearm weapons to vault into the air. While you are wielding a weapon with the Reach property, your jump distance is doubled.

While wielding a weapon with the Reach property, when you expend a ki point to use your Step of the Wind feature, your jump distance is instead tripled for the turn, and you gain advantage on your next melee weapon attack you make this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Serpent Strikes
entries: You learn the following techniques to augment your attacks:

items: {@bold Cobra Strike} When a creature you can see moves into your reach, you can use your reaction to make one attack against that creature.
{@bold Python Strike} When you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, you can also use your Stunning Strike on that attack without expending a ki point.

{@bold Viper Strike} Once on your turn when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend 1 or more ki points, up to a number equal to your proficiency bonus. The attack deals 1d6 poison damage, plus 1d6 additional poison damage per ki point spent, and the target is poisoned until the end of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Serpent Stances
entries: At the start of your turn, you can adopt a serpent stance (no action required). When you do, choose one of the following serpent stances, which last until you are incapacitated or use this feature again.

items: {@bold Anaconda Stance.} While using this stance, increase the reach of your melee weapon attacks and unarmed strikes by 10 feet.
{@bold Black Mamba Stance.} While using this stance, once per turn when you miss with a weapon attack, you may make an additional melee attack as part of the same action.
{@bold Couatl Stance.} While using this stance, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed.
{@bold Marilith Stance.} While using this stance, you can take one reaction on every turn in combat, instead of once each round.

subclassFeature.name: Supreme Serpent
entries: When you adopt a Serpent Stance, you can instead adopt two serpent stances at the same time, gaining the benefits of both effects.

subclassFeature.name: Oath of Hexes
entries: Those who swear an oath of hexes are sworn to witch covens, fey creatures, and occult deities of magic, fate, and death. In exchange, this sacred oath empowers paladins with fickle magic to curse those who would try to tempt fate or escape the ire of the Old Gods.

entries.name: Tenets of Hexes
entries: {@bold Serve the Occult.} Deities with power over the future have infused you with occult magic. Through your oath, you are made a mortal vessel for their inscrutable will.

{@bold Keeper of Secrets.} This world harbors dark secrets which are best kept long forgotten. You stand as the protectors of those secrets, preventing them from falling into the hands of weak-willed mortals who would misuse them to evil ends.
{@bold Arbiter of Fate.} The strands of fate were woven long ago, and it is folly to fight them. Misfortune befalls all.

{@bold Show No Mercy.} Though some think your strange powers are dark or corrupted, you vanquish evil with the very curses and magics that they would use against you. Show no mercy to those who resist their fate.

subclassFeature.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed in the Oath of Hexes Spells table. See the Sacred Oath class feature for how oath spells work.

entries.caption: Oath of Hexes Spells
rows: {@spell hellish rebuke|PHB}, {@spell Tasha's hideous laughter|PHB}, {@spell eldritch blast|PHB}

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity
entries: You gain the following Channel Divinity options:

items: {@bold Curse of Hexes} As an action, you curse one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. When you curse a target, choose an ability score. The chosen creature has disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks using that ability score for one minute or until it drops to 0 hit points or falls unconscious. At the end of each of the cursed creature's turns, it can make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC. On a successful save, the curse ends.

{@bold Curse of Torment} As a bonus action, you curse one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. Searing pain wracks the target for one minute. While suffering this pain, it takes necrotic damage equal to your paladin level at the start of each of its turns. Each time it takes this damage, it can make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a successful save, the pain ends.

subclassFeature.name: Curse of Hexes
entries: As an action, you curse one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. When you curse a target, choose an ability score. The chosen creature has disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks using that ability score for one minute or until it drops to 0 hit points or falls unconscious. At the end of each of the cursed creature's turns, it can make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC. On a successful save, the curse ends.

subclassFeature.name: Curse of Torment
entries: As a bonus action, you curse one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. Searing pain wracks the target for one minute. While suffering this pain, it takes necrotic damage equal to your paladin level at the start of each of its turns. Each time it takes this damage, it can make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a successful save, the pain ends.

subclassFeature.name: Bewitching Aura
entries: You emit an eldritch aura out to a range of 10 feet. When an enemy hits you or a creature within 10 feet of you with an attack, you can use your reaction to force that enemy to make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, you can magically redirect the attack to another creature of your choice within 10 feet of you and within range of the attack. The new target is hit by the attack and suffers all damage and effects.
At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Reversal of Fortune
entries: Whenever a creature scores a critical hit against you, the next time you hit that creature with an attack, that attack automatically becomes a critical hit.

subclassFeature.name: Death Hex
entries: A creature afflicted by your Curse of Hexes or Curse of Torment becomes vulnerable to all damage.

subclassFeature.name: Urban Ranger
entries: Urban rangers are less accustomed to nature and the wilds, but to the rooftops and guerilla tactics of city warfare. Training for maneuverability and stealth amongst ruined buildings, and twisting streets, these rangers are at home amongst the ruins and rubble. They are agile runners, skilled snipers, and always able to know where the best vantage points against their enemies are.

subclassFeature.name: Urban Ranger Magic
entries: You learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Urban Ranger Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

subclassFeature.name: Gutter Runner
entries: You gain a climb speed equal to your walking speed, and proficiency in the Athletics and Acrobatic skills if you don't already have it. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of those proficiencies.

In addition, when you take the Dash action on your turn, you can move through other creature's spaces without penalty (but not stop there). When you do, your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Vantage Point
entries: When you make a ranged weapon attack against a creature, you gain advantage on the attack roll if there are no other creatures within 5 feet of that target, or if you are 20 feet or more above the target and that creature doesn't have cover.

subclassFeature.name: Rooftop Mobility
entries: Your movement speed increases by 10 feet, and you can take the Dash action as a bonus action on your turn. In addition, you have mastered the means to propel yourself forwards and upwards when you move and climb. When you take the Dash action on your turn, your jumping distance increases to match your movement speed.

subclassFeature.name: Perfect Position
entries: When you attack a creature with the benefits of your Vantage Point feature, you deal an additional 2d6 damage to the target, and score a critical hit on a d20 roll of 19–20.

subclassFeature.name: Sitting Duck
entries: Once on your turn, when you hit a creature that did not move on its last turn with a ranged weapon attack, that attack automatically becomes a critical hit.

subclassFeature.name: Smuggler
entries: Whenever someone has something of value, usually illegal, that they need delivered discreetly, they call a smuggler. These rogues are experts at concealing, stealing, and blending in unnoticed to the common folk. They are also uniquely skilled at turning opportunities around when things are not going their way, and using whatever means necessary to achieve their goals. These slippery rogues are crafty and cunning and should not be underestimated.

subclassFeature.name: Pack Rat
entries: Provided you have your hands free, you can retrieve and stow handheld items or weapons on your person as part of the action you use them (including the Attack action).

You have accumulated a collection of miscellaneous gear, which you conceal on your person for emergencies. This gear is kept in a bag, jacket, or backpack that you carry with you. You can retrieve any nonmagical, inanimate item detailed in the Adventuring Gear section of the Core Rules with a value of 25 gp or less and weighing less than 10 pounds. You may use this feature to retrieve a number of items equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.
Though otherwise functional, objects retrieved using this feature are visibly worthless junk.

activation.condition: as part of the action to use them

subclassFeature.name: Tricks of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with the disguise kit, land vehicles, and water vehicles.
Whenever you make an ability check related to smuggling or concealing objects you add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

If you are driving a wagon, boat, or other vehicle with which you are proficient, you know tricks and modifications that you can make to build simple smuggler compartments in almost any vehicle. After one hour of work, you can conceal up to one-quarter of the maximum carrying capacity of the vehicle at the Game Master's discretion. It takes one hour of work to modify a Large or smaller vehicle, eight hours to modify a huge vehicle, and two days to modify a Gargantuan or larger vehicle.

subclassFeature.name: Blend Into the Crowd
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by two or more creatures that aren't hostile to you. Those creatures must be within 5 feet of each other and at least your size or larger.

subclassFeature.name: Slip Past
entries: You can move through another creature's space, including hostile creatures, without penalty when you take the Dash or Disengage action on your turn.
When you do so, you gain advantage on attack rolls against any creature whose space you moved through this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Never Tell Me the Odds
entries: Sometimes when the odds seem against you is the exact right moment to pull a fast one on your foes, using the chaos to get in a vital strike.
You can still apply your Sneak Attack even when you have disadvantage on the attack roll, so long as you meet the other conditions for making a Sneak Attack.

subclassFeature.name: Smuggled Spells
entries: Beginning at 17th level, you can store spells cast by other creatures in your bag. Your bag can store up to 6 levels worth of spells at a time.

Any creature can cast a spell of 1st through 5th level into your bag by touching the bag as the spell is cast. The spell has no effect, other than to be stored in your bag. If your bag can't hold the spell, the spell is expended without effect. The level of the slot used to cast the spell determines how much space it uses.

Alternatively, you can place a spell scroll in the bag. The spell is cast and stored in your bag and the spell scroll is destroyed. You can cast any spell stored in your bag. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original caster, but is otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the bag is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.

subclassFeature.name: Delerium Soul
entries: Delerium is naturally drawn to magic and can twist and augment its presence in unnatural and unpredictable ways. Some who ventured into the ruins of Drakkenheim are twisted by the eldritch powers and emerge infused with contaminated energies. They become a living vessel for the Arcane Anomalies and twisting realities found within the ruins.

subclassFeature.name: Delerium Spells
entries: Imbued with the eldritch power of delerium, your magic is fundamentally contaminated. You learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the Delerium Spells table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.
Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a contaminated spell.

entries.caption: Delerium Soul Spells
rows: {@spell vanish to the space between worlds|SCGtD}, {@spell weave the elder sign|SCGtD}

subclassFeature.name: Mutant Manifestation
entries: When you finish a long rest, you can choose to roll twice on the Mutations table (see page 231), and must select one of the results. You gain that mutation, which remains until you finish a long rest, even if you don't currently have any contamination levels.

subclassFeature.name: Contaminated Sorcery
entries: When you cast a contaminated spell, you can cast it by expending a spell slot as normal or by spending a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level. If you cast the spell using sorcery points, you don't gain a Contamination Level by casting the spell, and if the spell requires delerium as a material component, it is not consumed by the spell. In addition, casting a contaminated spell in this manner immediately causes an Arcane Anomaly (see page 233).

subclassFeature.name: Incomprehensible Arcana
entries: You can tap into contaminated energy to cast a spell you do not know. You can cast any spell from any class spell list. The spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots, and you must expend a spell slot as normal. Casting the spell uses the spell's normal casting time, and if the spell has material components, you must provide those components as normal. As part of casting the spell, but before the spell takes effect, you gain a number of Contamination Levels equal to half the spell's level, rounded down (minimum of one). You can't prevent or reduce these Contamination Levels by any means, but you can remove them as normal.

subclassFeature.name: Chaos Theory
entries: Once per turn when you make an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can choose to trigger an Arcane Anomaly (see page 233). If you do, you make that roll with advantage. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Cosmic Patron
entries: Some warlocks gain their eldritch power from the very cosmos, answering to entities of space, the constellations, planets, and moons. A warlock swearing fealty to a Cosmic patron typically believes they speak to gods, or god-like beings, but these entities are shrouded in mystery, their appearance incomprehensible and horrible, and their divine power is bestowed into the warlock from the stars and galaxies beyond.

subclassFeature.name: Expanded Spell List
entries: The Cosmos lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

subclassFeature.name: Cosmic Attributes
entries: You take on an otherworldly cosmic appearance or essence. Choose one or more of the attributes listed below, decide your own, or roll randomly to determine how the cosmic powers bestowed into you take form.

items: Your eyes become pools of inky black with small galaxies floating within them. To look into them is as if floating through the cosmos lost in the void of space.
Your touch becomes cold as ice and your skin becomes pale. Some might think you undead or sickly. You appear as if you had died in the cold of space.

Your voice has a slight echoing nature to it. As if there is more than one entity speaking through you. Your own voice is most prominent but when listening carefully one can make out a chorus of celestial voices speaking through you.
You give off a faint smell of ozone — acrid and sulfuric, as if lightning had just struck nearby. It seems unnatural and otherworldly.
You develop a third eye in the middle of your forehead that is unblinking, and seems to pierce into people's minds as it stares upon them.
Your veins glow with a soft radiant light, giving you the appearance of a walking constellation of stars and cosmic energy.

subclassFeature.name: Shooting Stars
entries: Beginning at first level, you learn the {@spell eldritch blast|PHB} cantrip if you don't know it already. It doesn't count against the number of warlock cantrips you know. When you cast {@spell eldritch blast|PHB}, you can have it deal radiant damage instead of force damage.

subclassFeature.name: Cosmic Guidance
entries: You can speak, read, and write Celestial and Deep Speech. In addition, you learn the {@spell guidance} cantrip. It doesn't count against the number of warlock cantrips you know. Additionally, you may cast the spell {@spell augury} once without expending a spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Orbit
entries: Once per turn when you miss a creature with eldritch blast, the beam returns to you as an orbiting comet around your head. While you have an orbiting comet, you can absorb its energy to do the following:

items: {@bold Cosmic Power.} Once on your turn when you cast eldritch blast, you can consume one orbiting comet to fire an additional beam.
{@bold Interception.} You can use your reaction to intercept a melee or ranged attack, gaining resistance to the damage from that attack.
{@bold Lightspeed.} As a bonus action, you can consume a comet to teleport 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

entries: You can have a maximum number of orbiting comets equal to your proficiency bonus. As long as you have comets, you glow with bright light out to 20 feet, and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The comets last until you finish a short or long rest, or until you dismiss them (no action required).

subclassFeature.name: Meteoric Impact
entries: Once per turn when you hit a creature with eldritch blast, you can cause the beam to explode. Each creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take [[/roll 3d6]] fire damage.
The damage increases to [[/roll 4d6]] damage at 14th level, and to [[/roll 5d6]] damage at 17th level.

subclassFeature.name: Supernova
entries: Charged by the energy of the stars, you gain additional benefits from the otherworldly entities lurking in the deep void of space.

items: When you cast {@spell eldritch blast}, you can fire one additional beam.
Whenever you score a critical hit with {@spell eldritch blast}, you can use your Meteoric Impact feature an additional time that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Flesh Patron
entries: A Warlock of the Flesh has made a pact with an entity so alien and unknown that its mere existence is enough to cause madness in most people. These warlocks have allowed an alien entity to inhabit their bodies, answering to some ancient and eldritch thing from beyond comprehension. This entity creates a symbiotic relationship with the host, granting them powers while reshaping and twisting their form.

subclassFeature.name: Expanded Spell List
entries: The Flesh lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

subclassFeature.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Reshape Flesh
entries: As an action, you can take on a reshaped form, which lasts until you become incapacitated, use an action to change back, or use this feature again. When you do, choose from one of the reshaped forms below:

items: {@bold Inverse Kneecaps.} Your legs become more powerful, and your knees now bend the opposite direction. While in this form, you increase your walking speed by 10 feet, and you can double your long and high jump distance.

{@bold Aquatic Attributes.} You grow gills and your skin becomes slimy, the flesh between your fingers and toes becomes webbed. While in this form, you can breathe underwater, and gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

{@bold Natural Weapons.} You grow claws, fangs, spines, horns, or a different natural weapon of your choice. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, as appropriate to the natural weapon you chose, and you are proficient with your unarmed strikes. You can use your Charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls. The damage of your unarmed strikes increases as you gain levels in this class: 2d6 damage beginning at 10th level, and 3d6 damage at 14th level.

subclassFeature.name: Body Modification
entries: When you choose your reshaped form, you can choose any two options available to you. You gain the following additional options when you take on a reshaped form:

items: {@bold Gelatin Bones.} Your skin looks loose and saggy as you struggle to maintain your structure. You can now fit into spaces as small as one inch in diameter and gain advantage on Stealth checks.

{@bold Change Appearance.} You transform your appearance. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, sound of your voice, hair length, coloration, and distinguishing characteristics, if any. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your statistics change. You can't appear as a creature of a different size than you, and your basic shape stays the same. For example, if you're bipedal, you can't use this spell to become quadrupedal.

{@bold Combat Instincts.} You can attack twice, instead of once, when you take the Attack action on your turn. In addition, your natural weapons and unarmed strikes are considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

{@bold Spider Claws.} Your hands and feet grow strange mucus-slicked insectoid features that allow you to climb surfaces. You gain a climb speed equal to your walk speed and can stick to ceilings as well without needing to make an ability check.

subclassFeature.name: Physiological Mastery
entries: You gain the following additional options when you take on a reshaped form:

items: {@bold Aerial Adaptation.} Feathered or batlike wings rip out of your back, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed.

{@bold Toxic Fumes.} A cloud of noxious gas seeps from your pores, you appear sickly, and green slime oozes from your pores. You have disadvantage on Charisma checks while in this form, but any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of you takes 2d6 poison damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls against you.
{@bold Hardened Skin.} You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from non-magical weapons.

subclassFeature.name: Unfathomable Horror
entries: You can choose any three available options when you transform using your Reshape Flesh feature. Additionally, you are immune to any spell or effect that would alter your form against your will.

subclassFeature.name: Malfeasant
entries: The path of the Malfeasant wizard unlocks eldritch abilities lesser spellcasters consider to be unnatural. Malfeasant wizards flout the restrictions of the Amethyst Academy which bar such forbidden magic. As a result, most hide from the Academy and the Silver Order, having been expelled from the school for their pursuit of such dark and dangerous magic.

subclassFeature.name: Forbidden Study
entries: Whenever you gain a wizard level, you can add one Contaminated Spell to your spellbook. This is in addition to the two wizard spells you normally learn. You don't need to research or discover the spell beforehand, instead developing the spell as a result of your own research.

subclassFeature.name: Horrific Potential
entries: If you undergo a Monstrous Transformation, the form chosen by the Game Master must have a Challenge Rating equal to at least half your level (rounded down), but can't have a Challenge Rating greater than your level.

subclassFeature.name: Anomalous Materials
entries: You've learned how to cast Contaminated Spells while shielding yourself from their harmful energies. You don't gain a Contamination Level when you cast a Contaminated Spell. Any delerium required as material components for the spell isn't consumed when you cast the spell in this way, but you must still provide those components. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Increased Threshold
entries: Your dedicated long-term exposure to eldritch contamination has inured your body to its effects, and you can withstand a greater accumulation of contamination. You gain proficiency in Constitution saving throws and resistance to necrotic damage. When determining which Symptoms apply to you as a result of gaining Eldritch Contamination, you are treated as having a number of Contamination Levels equal to half your current Contamination Level instead, rounded down. For example, if you gained 5 Contamination Levels, you would only suffer the Symptoms of Contamination Level 2. Thus, you would need to gain 12 Contamination Levels to undergo a Monstrous Transformation, instead of 6. In the same manner, when checking to see if you develop a mutation when you gain a new Contamination Level, you are treated as having a number of Contamination Levels equal to half your current Contamination Level instead, rounded down. For example, if you gained 4 Contamination Levels, you would only develop a new mutation if the result of the 1d6 roll is 2 or lower. Note that if you have six or more contamination levels, being subject to the purge contamination spell will cause you to gain six (or more) levels of exhaustion, and you'll die as a result.

subclassFeature.name: Expel Contaminants
entries: You've discovered an arcane method to safely discharge eldritch pollutants from your own body. Whenever you finish a long rest, you can reduce your Contamination Level by an amount equal to half your proficiency bonus (rounded down).

subclassFeature.name: Contaminated Casting
entries: You can gain Contamination Levels to empower your spells. Whenever you cast a spell which has increased effects from being cast using a higher-level spell slot, you can increase the spell's level without expending a higher-level spell slot. For each level you increase the spell's level in this way, you gain 1 Contamination Level. For example, if you wanted to cast the 3rd-level spell fireball as if it was a 5th-level spell, you could expend a 3rd-level spell slot and gain 2 Contamination Levels instead. You can't use this feature on a Contaminated Spell, nor to increase a spell's level higher than your highest level spell slot.

subclassFeature.name: Stabilizing Focus
entries: While you are concentrating on a spell, you ignore the Symptoms of any Contamination Levels you have gained, except for a Monstrous Transformation.

subclassFeature.name: Apotheosis in Flesh
entries: If you undergo a Monstrous Transformation, you maintain control over your new form for 1 minute. Unless you die, you revert back to your original form after 24 hours. When you assume your original form, you gain the benefits of a long rest and all Contamination Levels are removed from you. The Game Master determines what memories you retain from your transformation, if any. Regardless, the harrowing experience will haunt you in your nightmares forever, and you gain one form of Drakkenheim Madness.

monster.name: Corpsewrought Creature

hp.special: 5 + five times your apothecary level (the creature has a number of hit dice [d12s] equal to your apothecary level)
