entries: 这个事物向它能看到的一个生物低语着一个可怕的真相，距离在5英尺内。目标必须进行一次感知豁免检定。未通过检定的话，它会受到{@damage 4d6}点精神伤害，并且必须立即使用其反应（如果有的话），以其速度允许的范围尽可能远离这个事物。这个生物不会移动到明显危险的地面上，比如火源或坑洞。

action.name: Thought Tendril
entries: 这个物体在5英尺内能看到的一个生物身上进行精神攻击。目标必须进行一次智力豁免才能。未通过豁免的目标会受到{@damage 4d6}点的精神伤害，并且直到其下一个回合结束前不能进行反应。另外，在它的下一个回合，它必须选择是移动、行动还是奖励行动；它只能选择其中的一个。

trait.name: Amorphous Form (Animated Sludge, Entropic Flame, and Living Haze)
entries: The delerium elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Deep Haze (Living Haze Only)
entries: The delerium elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. A creature who enters or starts its turn in the same space as the delerium elemental must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage on a failed saving throw.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes a number of slam or hurl flame attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10} + 4 + the spell's level bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame (Entropic Flame Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10} + 2 + the spell's level fire damage. Before or after making this attack, the delerium elemental can teleport up to 10 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Grasping Tide (Animated Sludge Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}{@damage 2d8} + 4 + the spell's level bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16).

action.name: Shard Slam (Walking Geode Only)
entries: A creature hit by the delerium elemental's melee attacks must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed saving throw, it is pushed 10 feet away from the delerium elemental.

spell.name: Acid Burn
entries: 你在你面前的一个15英尺锥形范围内神奇地喷出一股酸性配方。锥形范围内的所有生物必须成功进行一次敏捷豁免检定，否则将受到{@damage 1d6}酸性伤害。
这个法术的伤害在你达到5级（{@dice 2d6}），11级（{@dice 3d6}）和17级（{@dice 4d6}）时增加了{@dice 1d6}。

spell.name: Bacterial Barrage
entries: 你对范围内的生物发动攻击，使用一种快速蔓延的感染，利用现有的条件。对目标进行远程法术攻击，在命中时，感染会对目标造成{@damage 1d8}点死灵伤害。如果目标正在患有{@condition poisoned}状态或疾病，则会改为造成{@damage 1d12}点死灵伤害。
当你达到5级（%0%或%1%）时，法术的伤害增加一个骰子；当你达到11级（%2%或%3%）时，伤害再增加一个骰子；当你达到17级（%4%或%5%）时，伤害再次增加一个骰子。

spell.name: Poison Needle
entries: 你向一个你能看到的生物发射一支涂有致命毒药的幻术飞镖。对目标进行远程法术攻击。命中后，目标受到{@damage 1d10}毒素伤害。
如果毒素伤害将目标降至0点生命值，目标会保持稳定，但在1小时内仍然是{@condition poisoned}，即使恢复生命值后也是如此，并且在这种情况下是{@condition paralyzed}，而且在{@condition poisoned}时。
这个法术的伤害在你达到5级（{@dice 2d10}），11级（{@dice 3d10}）和17级（{@dice 4d10}）时增加了{@dice 1d10}。

spell.name: Acrid Orb

components.m: a vial of stomach acid and a pinch of sulfate

entries: 你创造了一个酸性凝胶球，并将其投向射程内的一个生物。对目标进行远程法术攻击。命中时，目标受到{@damage 2d6}酸性伤害。无论攻击是否命中，球体都会爆炸。目标及其周围5英尺范围内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，否则将受到{@damage 2d6}酸性伤害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用2级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，爆炸性酸性伤害会每超过1级的位数增加{@dice 1d6}。

spell.name: Envenom

components.m: a vial of basic poison

entries: 选择你能看到范围内的一个生物，施加魔法毒药。目标受到{@damage 2d4}点毒素伤害，并必须进行一次体质豁免。未通过豁免的生物，在法术持续时间内变成{@condition poisoned}。
在这种情况下，目标必须在每个回合结束时进行一次体质豁免检定。在未通过豁免检定时，目标会受到{@damage 2d4}点毒素伤害。若通过检定，该法术在目标身上结束。
对目标施放的一次次级恢复（lesser restoration）法术会提前结束这个法术。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
2级或更高级时，你可以每超过1级，对一个额外目标施放法术。

spell.name: Infect

components.m: a petri dish

entries: 你用一种魔法疾病折磨一个你能看到的生物，距离内。在目标的每个回合开始时，它必须进行一次体质豁免检定。生物在豁免检定失败时受到{@damage 1d12}点死灵伤害，成功时受到一半伤害。如果一个目标在三次检定中成功，那么法术结束。
对目标施放的一次次级恢复（lesser restoration）法术会提前结束这个法术。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
2级或更高级，伤害每超过1级的两个法术位等级增加{@dice 1d12}。

spell.name: Stream of Consumption
entries: 在法术持续时间内，你的舌头变成了一根长长的死灵绿能连接线，你可以用它来吸取其他生物的活力。你可以看到的距离60英尺内的一个你选择的生物必须进行一次体质豁免才能。未通过豁免的目标获得 {@condition exhaustion} 的等级，你则回复等同于 {@dice 1d4} + 你的法术属性调整值的生命值。
在法术持续期间的每个回合，你可以使用你的动作来瞄准同一个生物或不同的生物，但如果某生物在此次施放的消耗之流法术的豁免检定中成功了，就不能再次瞄准该生物。

spell.name: Toxic Shield

components.m: a drop of dwarven blood

entries: 你获得对毒性伤害的抗性，并在持续时间内对被{@condition poisoned}影响的豁免 throws 获得优势。此外，每当在你5英尺范围内的生物用近战攻击击中你时，盾牌会向他们喷洒毒液，对攻击者造成{@damage 1d8}点毒性伤害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用2级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，每超过1级的2个法术位级别，毒素伤害就会增加{@dice 1d8}。

spell.name: Biohazard

components.m: a withered root and a drop of vinegar

entries: 在法术持续时间内，你将一座边长为15英尺的立方体涂满有毒淤泥。这个区域是艰难地形，充满危险的烟雾。任何进入该区域或在其中开始回合的生物必须进行一次体质豁免检定。未通过豁免检定的生物会受到{@damage 1d8}毒素伤害，并在其下一个回合开始前处于{@condition poisoned}状态。即使生物屏住呼吸或不需要呼吸，它们也会受到影响。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
3级或更高级时，每超过2级的插槽等级，伤害增加 {@dice 1d8}。

spell.name: Caustic Grip
entries: 在咒语持续时间内，你的手会分泌黏稠灼热的酸液，你可以用它来抓住生物并让其承受痛苦。当你施放这个咒语时，并且在你的回合中作为一个动作，直到咒语结束，你可以对你身边5英尺内的一个生物进行近战法术攻击。命中时，你对目标造成{@damage 4d4}酸性伤害，并且该生物会在你的酸性控制下，直到你的下一个回合结束。你可以每轮攻击同一个目标，或随时选择一个新目标。如果你切换目标，之前的目标将不再受该咒语影响。
一个生物{@condition restrained}被你抓住后，可以使用其动作对抗你的法术豁免 DC 进行力量检定。如果成功，它就不再是{@condition restrained}。每当一个生物以这个法术结束其回合{@condition restrained}时，它会额外受到{@damage 4d4}点酸性伤害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
3级或更高级时，每超过2级的插槽等级，伤害增加 {@dice 2d4}。

spell.name: Grasping Ghost

components.m: a finger bone and a scrap of fabric

entries: 一群漂浮的幽灵之手出现并抓住你能看到的目标。目标必须成功进行一次力量豁免投掷。目标在豁免失败时受到{@damage 3d8}点死灵伤害，豁免成功时受到一半伤害。
此外，在未能通过豁免检定时，幽灵之手将缠住目标，直到你的下一个回合结束，并立即将目标朝你选择的方向移动多达30英尺（但不能向上）。在目标的回合，该生物可以使用一个动作来尝试通过进行一次力量或敏捷检定（由其选择）对抗你的法术豁免 DC 以尝试摆脱缠绕。如果成功，缠绕结束。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
3级或更高级别，(Grasping Ghost) 可以针对每个超过2级的法术等级再额外选择一个范围内的生物。

spell.name: Invigorate

components.m: a syringe and a blood sample

entries: 选择范围内的最多三个生物。每个目标获得10点临时生命值。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用2级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，每个高于2级的法术位级别，临时生命值增加5点。

spell.name: Ocular Necrosis
entries: 对你能看到的范围内的生物进行远程法术攻击。如果命中，你用致命毒素折磨该生物，导致它们的眼睛流血。该生物受到{@damage 2d6}点死灵伤害，并在你的下一个回合结束前处于{@condition blinded}状态。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用3级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，每个高于2级的法术位，死灵伤害增加{@dice 1d6}。

spell.name: Corrosive Blast

components.m: a vial of acid

entries: 一股刺鼻的化学物质从你的手中喷涌而出。30英尺锥形范围内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免检定。在豁免失败时生物会受到{@damage 10d4}酸性伤害，在豁免成功时则只受到一半伤害。
该酸性物质会摧毁咒语区域内的所有有机材料制成的物体。被这个咒语杀死的生物，其肉体会完全溶解，只留下腐蚀的骨架。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用4级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，酸性伤害将每个高于3级的法术位等级增加{@dice 2d4}。

spell.name: Fetid Blade

components.m: a drop of acid and a pinch of iron dust

entries: 你将你触摸的武器涂上一种酸性物质。直到咒语结束，用它进行的武器攻击在命中时额外造成{@damage 2d4}点酸性伤害。如果武器还不是一把魔法武器，它将在持续时间内变成一把魔法武器。
此外，被使用该武器进行近战攻击击中的生物必须进行一次体质豁免检定。如果未能通过豁免检定，它将在攻击者的下一个回合结束前变为{@condition poisoned}。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用4级或更高级别的法术位施放此法术时，酸性伤害将每超过3级的位级增加{@dice 1d4}。

spell.name: Pestilence

components.m: a withered flower

entries: 你可以感染你能看到范围内的最多三个生物，使它们感染一种魔法疾病。在每个目标的回合开始时，它必须进行一次体质豁免检定。如果未通过豁免检定，该生物会受到{@damage 3d6}点死灵伤害，并获得1级{@condition exhaustion}。如果一个目标在三次检定中成功了三次，那个生物的法术效果就会结束。
对目标施放的次级恢复（Lesser Restoration）法术会提前结束该生物的这个法术。

spell.name: Purge Contamination

m.text: 100 gp of alchemical fluids or holy water, which the spell consumes

entries: 你在背诵着一段严谨的魔法咒语的同时，向被污染的人形生物涂抹炼金液或圣水，从其身体中驱逐异界污染物。当你完成施法时，该生物身上的所有污染等级和变异都会被清除。接着，它会因为这个法术移除的每一个污染等级而获得 {@condition exhaustion} 的1级。

spell.name: Tranquilizing Toxin
entries: 你选择的范围内一个目标必须进行一次体质豁免才能，否则会受到{@damage 8d6}毒素伤害并在你的下一个回合结束前变成{@condition poisoned}。在这种方式下，目标也会被{@condition stunned}。豁免成功的话，目标只受一半伤害并不会{@condition poisoned}。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用4级或更高级别的法术位施放此法术时，毒素伤害将每超过3级的位数增加{@dice 1d6}。

spell.name: Venomous Aura

components.m: scales or fangs of a venomous snake

entries: 你散发出一股凶恶的气场，让靠近你的生物感到迷惑。任何在你身边10英尺范围内开始他们的回合的生物都会在他们的下一个回合开始前处于{@condition poisoned}状态。

spell.name: Blood Worm

components.m: a jar full of leeches

entries: 你可以看到范围内的生物感染一种恶性寄生虫形式的魔法疾病。每回合一次，当一名生物用武器攻击命中被感染的目标时，该攻击额外造成{@damage 4d6}点死灵伤害，并且攻击者回复等同于死灵伤害的生命值。每次被感染的目标承受这个死灵伤害时，都需要进行一次针对该法术的体质豁免检定。如果豁免成功，法术结束。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用5级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，死灵伤害会每超过4级的位级增加{@dice 1d6}。

spell.name: Corpse Explosion

time.condition: which you take when a creature you can see dies within 120 feet of you.

entries: 你让触发生物的身体在一阵暴力的血肉和感染组织的喷射中爆炸。距离以触发生物身体为中心的点10英尺内的生物受到{@damage 4d8}死灵伤害和{@damage 4d8}酸性伤害，或者在成功的敏捷豁免扑救后受到一半伤害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
5级或更高级，伤害增加{@damage 1d8}酸性伤害，每超过4级的槽位等级增加一次。

spell.name: Corrupting Spores

components.m: a dried mushroom

entries: 在你能看到的射程内，一个5英尺的正方形区域里突然长出了三朵毒蘑菇。这些蘑菇散发出有毒的孢子，任何一个在距离蘑菇区域10英尺内开始回合的生物必须进行一次体质豁免才能。未通过豁免的生物会因为每朵蘑菇造成{@damage 1d8}毒素伤害，并在其下一个回合开始前处于{@condition poisoned}状态。
在咒语持续期间，你可以在你的回合使用一个额外动作，使补丁内长出另一个蘑菇。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用5级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，每超过4级的位级都会额外长出一个蘑菇，与最初的一片一起。

spell.name: Last Rites

components.m: a small piece of brass, a rose petal, and a drop of holy water

entries: 你瞄准你能看见的范围内的生物，用一道神圣之光照射在它们身上。目标必须进行一次感知豁免投骰。目标在未通过豁免检定时受到{@damage 8d8}点辐射伤害，通过检定时受到一半伤害。这个法术对天神或构造物无效。
如果你的目标是不死生物或恶魔，它们进行豁免检定时会带有劣势，并且法术对它们造成的伤害为最大值。
如果一个不死生物或恶魔被这个法术降低到0点生命值，它就会死亡，它的身体会化为灰烬。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用5级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，你可以针对每个超过5级的法术等级，在每个距离30英尺以内的额外生物进行目标选择。

spell.name: Poison Wave

components.m: a withered root and a drop of vinegar

entries: 一股有毒的烟雾从你身上散发出来。在你30英尺范围内的生物必须进行一次体质豁免检定。
在未通过豁免检定时，每个生物会受到{@damage 4d12}毒素伤害，并在你的下一个回合结束前变为{@condition poisoned}。若通过豁免检定，生物会受到一半伤害且不会变为{@condition poisoned}。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
5级或更高级别时，每超过4级的插槽等级，伤害增加 {@dice 1d12}。

spell.name: Summon the Thing with the Writhing Tail

components.m: a tuft of cat hair and a dead rat

entries: 你召唤出{@creature The Thing with the Writhing Tail|SCGtD}。它显现在你能看到的范围内的一个空地方。这个有形形态使用下面的属性块。当它的生命值降到0或法术结束时，这个生物会消失。
这个生物是你和你的同伴的盟友。在战斗中，这个生物与你共享先攻顺序，但它会在你之后立即行动。它会听从你的口头指令（你不需要采取任何行动）。如果你没有下达任何指令，它会采取{@action Dodge}行动并利用移动来避开危险。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用5级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，在状态块中出现法术等级的地方使用更高级别的等级。

spell.name: Vitriolic Ichor

components.m: a vial of nitric acid and a flask of water

entries: 选择范围内具有天然盔甲或穿着盔甲的生物。你让这个生物的天然或制造的盔甲在法术持续时间内变得腐蚀且脆弱。当盔甲被腐蚀时，生物的护甲等级变为10 + 生物的敏捷调整值。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用5级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，你可以针对每个高于4级的法术位级别额外选择一个生物作为目标。

spell.name: Acid Rain

components.m: a pinch of sulfur and ground coal

entries: 直到法术结束，一场酸雨将在一个以你选择的点为中心、半径为40英尺、高40英尺的圆柱内降落。该区域被轻度遮蔽，区域内的明火将被扑灭。
化学池在该区域的地面上积累，使其成为艰难地形。当生物在一个回合内第一次进入法术区域或在那里开始它的回合时，它会受到{@damage 3d6}酸性伤害，并必须进行一次敏捷豁免投掷。如果豁免失败，它会落入{@condition prone}池中，受到额外{@damage 3d6}酸性伤害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用6级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，酸性伤害每超过5级的位级增加{@dice 1d6}。

spell.name: Nerve Gas

components.m: samples of phosphate and chlorine mixed with a drop of pure alcohol

entries: 你在射程内选择的一个点上创造一个半径为10英尺的有毒雾气球。这团雾气可以穿过拐角。
这个效果持续一段时间，或者直到强风吹散了雾气，结束这个法术。这片雾气的区域是浓雾。
当一个生物在一个回合内第一次进入法术的范围或者在那里开始它的回合时，该生物必须进行一次智力豁免检定。如果豁免失败，该生物会受到{@damage 3d6}点精神伤害，并且会成为{@condition stunned}，直到其下一个回合开始。如果豁免成功，该生物会受到一半伤害并且不会成为{@condition stunned}。即使生物屏住呼吸或者不需要呼吸，它们也会受到影响。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
6级或更高级，伤害每超过5级的位级增加{@damage 1d6}点心灵伤害。

spell.name: Septic Shock

components.m: a piece of a rotten liver

entries: 选择你能看到范围内没有所有生命值的生物。你用腐烂细菌感染目标的伤口。目标必须进行一次体质豁免才能。
如果生物的生命值剩余不到最大值的一半，它将以劣势进行豁免投掷。如果豁免失败，目标将受到{@damage 10d8}死灵伤害，并获得1级{@condition exhaustion}。如果豁免成功，它会受到一半伤害，并且不会获得任何{@condition exhaustion}级别。

spell.name: Toxic Barrage

components.m: Four death cap mushrooms

entries: 你创造出四道纯净的毒素射线，将它们投向射程内的目标。你可以将它们投向一个目标或多个目标。
对每一道射线进行远程法术攻击。命中目标后，目标会受到{@damage 3d6}毒素伤害。如果目标被一道或多道射线击中，它必须进行一次体质豁免。未通过豁免的目标会在1分钟内处于{@condition poisoned}状态。在这种方式下，目标可以在自己的回合结束时重复进行豁免检定。若成功，它将不再处于{@condition poisoned}状态。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用6级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，你会为每个高于5级的法术位级别额外创造一道射线。

spell.name: Mephitic Vapors

components.m: a vial of chlorine

entries: 你在施法距离内可见的一个点上，涂抹一层刺鼻粘液，覆盖一个半径为20英尺的区域，持续时间内保持不变。这个区域变成艰难地形，任何完全位于该区域内的生物都被{@condition blinded}，且不能作出反应。
一个生物如果在该区域开始其回合，必须成功进行一次体质豁免才能避免受到{@damage 2d8} 毒素伤害和{@damage 2d8} 酸性伤害，并获得一层{@condition exhaustion}。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 如果你使用一个法术位来施放这个法术(%num%)。
在第7级或更高级别时，每超过第6级的插槽等级，伤害增加{@damage 1d8}毒性伤害和{@damage 1d8}酸性伤害。

spell.name: Vile Necrosis

components.m: a vial of coagulated blood

entries: 你伸出手指指向射程内的生物，向它们发射一道苍白的绿光束，产生削弱能量。
对目标进行远程法术攻击。命中后，目标受到{@damage 12d6}点死灵伤害，并陷入虚弱状态。
在受到这个法术影响时，目标使用武器攻击和施法造成的伤害减半。
一个虚弱的目标可以在每个回合结束时进行一次体质豁免检定。在成功豁免后，虚弱状态结束。

spell.name: Contamination Immunity

m.text: an eldritch lily mixed into 250 gp worth of purified fluids per target, which the spell consumes

entries: 直到法术结束，你触摸的一个愿意的生物对死灵伤害免疫，并且无法获得污染等级。
受影响的生物可以在（Haze）中正常休息。
如果生物施放了一个受污染的法术，这个法术会立即结束。

entries.name: Researching the Spell:
entries: 一个可以施放7级法术，了解中和领域法术，并曾访问过疯狂之心的角色可以研究污染免疫力。

spell.name: Grievous Wounds

components.m: a needle and several stitches

entries: 选择你能看到范围内的一个生物。你暂时剥夺目标的生理机能，足以使一个轻微的擦伤变成可怕的伤害。直到你的下一个回合结束，目标失去任何伤害抗性或免疫力，对所有伤害变得脆弱，并且所有豁免投掷都带有劣势。

spell.name: Miasma

components.m: a freshly harvested corpse lily

entries: 你在射程内的固体表面上创建了一堵病态的、黄绿色的有毒烟雾墙。你可以制造一堵长达60英尺、高20英尺、厚1英尺的墙，或者一堵直径长达20英尺、高20英尺、厚1英尺的环形墙。这堵墙是不透明的，持续时间内保持存在。
当墙壁出现时，其范围内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免投掷。未通过豁免的生物会受到{@damage 10d4}酸性伤害，通过豁免的生物则只受到一半伤害。
当你施放这个法术时，你选择的墙的一侧会散发有毒烟雾。每当一个生物结束回合时，如果它在距离该侧墙30英尺内或在墙内，它会受到{@damage 8d8}点毒性伤害。生物在一个回合内第一次进入墙内时也会受到同样的伤害。墙的另一侧不会造成伤害。
墙壁对毒素伤害的生物必须进行一次体质豁免才能在咒语持续时间内成为{@condition poisoned}(Wall of Thorns)。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: 当你使用8级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，伤害会每超过第7级的位级增加{@dice 2d8}。

spell.name: Pandemic

components.m: the fetid corpse of a plague rat

entries: 你感染一个你能看到范围内的生物，使其患上一种致命且高度传染的疾病，该疾病会持续直到被(大愈合), (治愈)或(许愿)治愈。其他能够移除疾病的法术和魔法效果均无法治愈此法术引起的感染。
当被感染时，生物必须在每个回合开始时进行一次体质豁免检定。如果豁免检定失败，它会受到{@damage 10d8}点死灵伤害，并在下一个回合开始前变成{@condition incapacitated}。如果豁免检定成功，它会受到一半伤害且不会是{@condition incapacitated}。被感染的生物必须在每个回合开始时进行豁免检定，直到死亡或被治愈。
一个生物在距离被这个法术感染的生物10英尺内开始其回合时，必须进行一次体质豁免投。
在未能通过豁免检定时，该生物感染了疾病。
当你施放这个法术时，你可以选择自己和最多其他八个生物不受这次施法引起的感染影响。

spell.name: Touch of Death

components.m: the finger of a hag

entries: 对距离你5英尺内的目标进行一次近战法术攻击。
命中时，目标受到200点毒素伤害。这种伤害无视目标对毒素伤害的任何抗性或免疫，无法被减少或阻止。
这种强效毒药残留在目标体内，将其引向死亡。受到这种毒药伤害而生命值降至零的目标，在完成一次长休息之前会自动失败死亡豁免投掷。对目标施放治疗术或强力恢复术的法术也会结束这种效果。

spell.name: Breath of Nightshade

components.m: A pair of deadly nightshade flowers

entries: 你呼出一股60英尺锥形的致命毒气。施法时范围内的每个生物必须进行一次体质豁免投。未通过豁免的生物在1小时内变为{@condition poisoned}。在受到这个法术的影响时，生物会变成{@condition paralyzed}。
如果受影响的生物受到任何伤害，该法术就会结束。

spell.name: Plague Wind

components.m: mucus from a ghoul

entries: 你召唤了一股滚滚肉食性疾病和剧烈血液沸腾烟雾的风暴，从你身上散发出来，覆盖了一个120英尺的锥形区域。该区域内的生物必须进行一次体质豁免才能。未通过豁免的生物会受到{@damage 5d8} 毒性伤害和{@damage 5d8} 死灵伤害，通过豁免的生物则只会受到一半伤害。在承受这些伤害后，任何生命值剩余25点或更少的受影响生物会立即死亡，并化为风化的骷髅，其肉体和软组织如灰烬般飞散。

spell.name: Neutralizing Field

m.text: A delerium crystal or holy relic worth 1,000 gp

entries: 你在一个半径为10英尺的球形范围内消除了被污染的魔法能量。直到咒语结束，这个球体会随着你移动，以你为中心。在球体内的生物（包括你）无法获得（`contaminated magical energies`）。
污染水平和对死灵伤害具有抵抗力。
受污染的法术不能被区域内的生物施放。

entries.name: Researching the Spell:
entries: 一个可以施放5级法术，知道净化污染法术，并且已经制造了至少1剂水净化剂的角色可以研究中和领域（Neutralizing Field）。

spell.name: Comet Shards

components.m: a delerium chip worth 10 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

You shatter the delerium fragment in your hand into three glowing comet-like motes of magical force which you hurl at your foes. Each comet hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A comet deals {@damage 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier force damage to its target and pushes it 10 feet away from you. The comets all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more comet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Corrupted Cure

components.m: a delerium chip worth 10 gp

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
When you cast this spell, the target can choose to gain a Contamination Level as well. If it does, it instead regains hit points equal to {@dice 8d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above first, or {@dice 4d6} if the target chooses to gain a Contamination Level.

spell.name: Controlled Mutation

components.m: a delerium chip worth 100gp

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.
You weave contaminated energy to temporarily imbue a creature within range with a beneficial mutation. Choose one of the following effects; the target gains that effect until the spell ends.

items.name: Dizziness
entries: 目标无法进行反应。

items.name: Strength
entries: The target has advantage on Strength attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. The target can choose to gain a Contamination Level. If it does, its melee weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage for the spell's duration.

items.name: Constitution
entries: The target has advantage on Constitution checks and saving throws. The target can choose to gain a Contamination Level. If it does, it gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for the spell's duration.

items.name: Dexterity
entries: The target has advantage on Dexterity attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. The target can choose to gain a Contamination Level. If it does, its attacks with ranged and finesse weapons score a critical hit on an 18–20 for the spell's duration.

items.name: Intelligence
entries: The target has advantage on Intelligence ability checks and saving throws, as well as spell attack rolls. The target can also choose to gain a Contamination Level. If it does, for the duration of this spell, while the target is concentrating on a spell it has cast, it's concentration can't be broken as a result of taking damage.

items.name: Wisdom
entries: The target has advantage on Wisdom ability checks and saving throws, as well as spell attack rolls. The target can also choose to gain a Contamination Level. If it does, for the duration of this spell, it gains blindsight to a range of 60 feet and can't be surprised while it is conscious.

items.name: Charisma
entries: The target has advantage on Charisma ability checks and saving throws, as well as spell attack rolls. In addition, the target can choose to gain a Contamination Level. If it does, for the duration of this spell, when the target makes a Charisma (Persuasion) or Charisma (Deception) check, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can choose one additional effect for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Vanish to the Space Between Worlds

time.condition: which you take when you take damage

components.m: a delerium chip worth 10 gp

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

When you cast this spell, you vanish from your current plane of existence and appear in the Space Between Worlds (avoiding the triggering damage). At the start of your next turn, you return to an unoccupied space of your choice within 30 feet of the space you vanished from. If no unoccupied space is available within that range, you appear in the nearest unoccupied space (chosen at random if more than one space is equally near).

While within the Space Between Worlds, you can see and hear the plane you originated from, which is cast as a roiling blur, and you can't see anything there more than 60 feet away. You can only affect and be affected by other creatures in the Space Between Worlds. Creatures that aren't there can't perceive you or interact with you, unless they have the ability to do so.

spell.name: Weave the Elder Sign

components.m: a delerium chip worth 10gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

You weave an impossible sign from an inscrutable reality in the air inside a 30-foot cube within range. It appears for only a moment before vanishing. Each creature in the area who sees the sign must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature becomes blinded and stunned for the spell's duration. On a successful saving throw, a creature is blinded until the end of your next turn.

The spell ends for a stunned creature if it takes any damage, or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor. When the spell ends for a stunned creature, it takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage.

spell.name: Horrific Transformation

components.m: see description

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

This spell transforms a willing creature that you touch into a horrific monstrosity. The spell has no effect on a shapechanger or a creature with 0 hit points. The transformation lasts for the duration, or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies.
The new form can be an aberration with a Challenge Rating of 4 or lower.
The target's game statistics, including mental ability scores, are replaced by the statistics of the chosen aberration. It retains its alignment and personality.

The target assumes the hit points of its new form. When it reverts to its normal form, the creature returns to the number of hit points it had before it transformed. If it reverts as a result of dropping to 0 hit points, any excess damage carries over to its normal form. As long as the excess damage doesn't reduce the creature's normal form to 0 hit points, it isn't knocked unconscious.
The creature is limited in the actions it can perform by the nature of its new form, and it can't speak, cast spells, or take any other action that requires hands or speech.
The target's gear melds into the new form. The creature can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment.

In addition to a delerium fragment worth 100gp, you must provide either the heart or brain (or equivalent organ in the case of aberrations with a truly alien physiology) taken from a creature of the same type: the organ must either be recently harvested or magically preserved via gentle repose or similar magic. As part of casting the spell, you drive the delerium fragment into the organ, and both are consumed by the spell. The Game Master determines if an aberration's physiology makes its organs suitable for use with this spell.

spell.name: Siphon Time

components.m: a broken clock, and a delerium fragment worth 100gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

You seize upon the flow of time around up to three creatures of your choice within range, drawing seconds from them to use them yourself. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.
An affected target can't take reactions. On its turn, it must choose to either move, take an action, or a bonus action: a target can do only one of the three.
A creature affected by this spell can spend its action to try to pull back the threads of time. If it does, it can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the effect ends for it.

While at least one other creature is affected by this spell, you gain an additional action on each of your turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Cast a Spell, Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action. If you use this action to cast a spell, that spell must be a cantrip with a casting time of one action.

spell.name: Summon Delerium Elemental

components.m: a delerium fragment worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

You call forth a {@creature Delerium Elemental|SCGtD|contaminated elemental} to do your bidding. Choose air, earth, fire, or water. Eldritch energy conjures a contaminated elemental of the chosen type, which appears in an unoccupied space within range: either an animated sludge (water), entropic flame (fire), living haze (air), or walking geode (earth). Each uses the summoned delerium elemental stat block below, but gains different traits based on the chosen element used to conjure the elemental. The elemental disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.

The elemental is friendly to you and your companions for the duration of the spell. In combat, the creature shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It obeys any verbal command you give it (no action required by you). If you don't give any commands, it attacks the closest hostile creature it can see, moving towards it by the most direct route.

The elemental doesn't disappear if you lose concentration on this spell. Instead, you lose control of the elemental, it becomes hostile toward you and your companions, and it attacks you. An uncontrolled elemental can't be dismissed by you, and it remains until it is destroyed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: AtHigherLevels
entries: 当你使用5级或更高级别的法术位施放这个法术时，在状态块中出现法术等级的地方使用更高级别的等级。

spell.name: Contaminated Hands

components.m: a delerium fragment worth 100gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

You create two Large hands of shimmering, octarine force in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. The hands last for the spell's duration. Both hands move at your command, mimicking the movements of your own hands.

Each hand is an object that has AC 20 and hit points equal to your hit point maximum. If one or both of the hands drop to 0 hit points, the spell ends. Each hand has a Strength of 26 (+8) and a Dexterity of 10 (+0) and occupies its space.

When you cast the spell, and as an action on your subsequent turns, you can move the hands up to 60 feet and then cause one of the following effects with each. Both hands can perform the same action, or different ones. The two hands must move to remain within 30 feet of each other.

items.name: Arcane Slam
entries: The hand strikes one creature or object within 5 feet of it. Make a melee spell attack for the hand using your game statistics. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d12} necrotic damage. If you direct both hands to attack the same target, they gain advantage on the attack roll.

items.name: Forceful Throw
entries: The hand attempts to push a creature within 5 feet of it in a direction you choose. Make a check with the hand's Strength contested by the Strength (Athletics) check of the target. If the target is Medium or smaller, you have advantage on the check. If you succeed, the hand pushes the target up to 5 feet plus a number of feet equal to five times your spellcasting ability modifier. The hand moves with the target to remain within 5 feet of it. If both hands are used against the same target, you can throw them ten times your spellcasting ability modifier, and gain advantage on the check against a Large or smaller target.

items.name: Eldritch Grip
entries: The hand attempts to grapple a Huge or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. You use the hand's Strength score to resolve the grapple. If the target is Medium or smaller, you have advantage on the check. If both the hands are used against the same target, they can grapple a creature regardless of its size, and you have advantage on the grapple check against a Large or smaller target.

items.name: Contaminated Crush
entries: You can have a hand crush a target it is grappling. When you do so, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to {@damage 2d12} + your spellcasting ability modifier. In addition, the target must make a Constitution saving throw or gain 1 Contamination Level. If both the hands are grappling the same target, you can have them rip the grappled target limb from limb. They deal an extra {@damage 4d12} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage from the arcane slam and contaminated crush options increases by {@damage 2d12} and the damage from the eldritch grip increases by {@damage 2d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Storm of Contamination

components.m: a delerium fragment worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

You create an arcing bolt of eldritch lightning that strikes a target of your choice that you can see within range. Multiple bolts then leap from that target to up to five other targets, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.

A target must make a Dexterity saving throw. The target takes {@damage 10d12} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a target which fails the saving throw gains 1 Contamination Level.

spell.name: Octarine Sword

components.m: a delerium fragment worth 100gp, and a dagger

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.
You create a sword-shaped plane of contaminated energy that hovers within range. It lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again.

When the sword appears, you make a melee spell attack against a target of your choice within 5 feet of the sword. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d10} force damage, and the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes an additional {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage and gains 1 Contamination Level.
Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to move the sword up to 30 feet to a spot you can see and repeat this attack against the same target or a different one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the force damage increases by {@damage 1d10} and the necrotic damage increases by {@damage 1d6} for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Unbind Gravity

components.m: a delerium fragment worth 100gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

This spell allows you to control gravity in a 100-foot-cube centered on a point within range. When you cast this spell and at the start of each of your turns for the spell's duration, you decide which direction gravity pulls within the area. All creatures and objects that aren't somehow anchored to the ground in the area fall in the direction you choose until they reach the edge of the area. A creature can make a Dexterity saving throw to grab onto a fixed object it can reach, thus avoiding the fall.

If some solid object (such as a ceiling) is encountered in this fall, falling objects and creatures strike it just as they would during a normal downward fall. If an object or creature reaches the edge of the area without striking anything, it remains there, oscillating slightly, for the duration.

Alternatively, you can decide to prevent gravity from acting within the area. When you do, creatures within the area levitate in midair, and must move by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows them to move as if they were climbing. Unattended objects float around randomly.
At the end of the duration, affected objects and creatures fall back down.

spell.name: Banish to the Space Between Worlds

components.m: a delerium fragment worth 100gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

You banish a creature that you can see within range into the Space Between Worlds. Upon this roiling plane of chaotic potential, the target wanders incomprehensible vistas searching for a way back via strange and absurd exits. The target remains there for the duration or until it escapes.

The target can use its action to attempt to escape. When it does so, it makes an Intelligence check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it escapes, and the spell ends. On a failed check, the target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage.
When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, in the nearest unoccupied space.

Time passes differently for the target within the Space Between Worlds, and it perceives its time spent there as having lasted hundreds or perhaps thousands of years, even if it was only gone for rounds or minutes in the mortal world.
A creature which dies in the Space Between Worlds does not return.

spell.name: Delerium Meteor Swarm

components.m: an igneous rock and a delerium fragment worth 100gp, which the spell consumes

entries: When you cast this spell, you gain 1 Contamination Level.

You call down eldritch falling stars that crash into the earth at four points you can see within range. Each creature within a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point you choose must make a Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes {@damage 10d6} radiant damage, {@damage 10d6} necrotic damage, {@damage 10d6} thunder damage, {@damage 10d6} psychic damage, and {@damage 10d6} force damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one burst is affected only once.

The falling stars leave lasting contamination in the areas they affect, which lasts for one hour. A creature that starts its turn within the affected area must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes {@damage 5d6} necrotic damage and gains 1 Contamination Level. It takes half as much damage and does not gain any Contamination Levels on a successful save. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage immediately undergoes a Monstrous Transformation as if they had gained 6 Contamination Levels.
The spell damages structures and objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

entries.name: Apothecary
entries: 一个戴着眼镜的男人站在手术台旁，研究着放在石板上的解剖怪物。电导体的噼啪声与他神秘的喃喃自语相和谐，当他拿起解剖刀和锯子时。当他完成最后一针时，生物的手突然抽搐，再次焕发生机。
穿着一件被酸蚀的厚外套，一个高大的半精灵酿制药剂和药水。她的脸被厚厚的黑色护目镜和呼吸面罩遮掩着，当她进行一种独特的草药学、炼金术、医学和魔法结合时。她的混合物在冒泡和沸腾，她在思考治疗是否会比疾病更糟糕。
一位苗条的提弗林人在安抚一位病人的痛苦时，抽取了一份受污染的血液样本。将小瓶举起来检查其中的液体，他们运用邪能将样本提炼成纯净的传染物。在一本枯萎的笔记本上匆匆记下他们的发现，然后将小瓶加入到他们的病原体和灾祸收藏中，以用来对抗敌人。

entries.name: Medical Experts
entries: 一位药剂师是一位经验丰富的医疗专家和奥术魔法使用者。
他们运用自己的知识来治愈和伤害，通过炼金术和神秘魔法增强他们的传统技能。
一些药剂师可能会首先尝试传统方法，如草药和外科手术技术来治疗。
当这些平凡的方法不够时，他们会使用奥术魔法和神秘力量来恢复他们的病人。
药剂师的独特技能在治疗自然或超自然疾病时都能派上用场，但药剂师拥有的对身体的知识不仅仅可以用于治疗。
他们的奥术方法可以强化、转化或保护他们的盟友，一些药剂师还懂得致命的技巧，可以伤害和杀死他们的敌人。
一位药剂师了解毒药和治疗药物之间的区别通常只在剂量上。(Apothecary)
他们对生死的仔细研究使得药剂师有能力帮助盟友从可怕的疾病、伤害中存活下来，并将他们从死亡的魔爪中解救出来，或者利用他们的敌人作为危险化合物、可怕疾病和有毒魔法的试验对象。

entries.name: Knowledge Seekers
entries: 大多数药剂师都立志于深造，拓展他们的魔法视野，发现新的运用魔法的方式，以达到危险或救生的效果，并学习那些被世界其他地方所隐匿的禁忌知识。
他们相信知识就是力量，并将自己视为知识的追求者。
一些善良的药剂师将自己视为无辜者的守护者，将他们的生命奉献给帮助生病和受伤的人。(apothecaries)
他人看到每一个机会都是剥削弱者、推动他们追求真正力量的机会。
许多人处于两者之间，既像疯狂科学家又像著名医生。

entries.name: Occult Practitioners
entries: 药剂师寻找神秘知识，并用它来研究和实践科学理论。
许多他们的魔法咒语，无论是用于拯救生命还是终结生命，都被视为实验性的。
许多药剂师都会随身携带笔记本，记录他们根据研究和实地工作得出的神秘理论。
在一些大陆上的偏远社区中，药剂师们正因为被视为人们可以求助的医生和治疗师而声名鹊起，而不是宗教人物。
然而，他们更常被视为危险的科学家和神秘的女巫，他们使用魔法制造毒素和毒药，可以消灭整个军队。

entries.name: Creating an Apothecary
entries: 当你开始创建一个药剂师时，最重要的问题是决定你的学习路径。
是什么驱使你追求知识？
你是否在为善事工作？你的生活是否致力于帮助那些有需要的人？
通过研究毒药、疾病、神秘知识和禁忌知识，你希望帮助病人和受伤者吗？
也许你的目标是拯救你关心的人，或者保护你的王国或家园免受这个世界的邪恶侵害。
或许你的研究更具危险性质。你会踏上冒险之旅，测试你危险的化学配方吗？
你把每个怪物或敌人都视为你药剂和法术的试验对象吗？
所有药剂师都追求知识，涉猎禁忌知识和神秘实践。
尽管许多从业者乐于在城市中向付费高的贵族和国王出售他们的服务或药剂，但有些人被召唤踏上冒险之旅，追寻无尽的知识。
其他人则作为调查员和研究员。许多药剂师将冒险视为进行直接现场研究、完善他们的技能并测试他们理论真正潜力的手段。

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: 按照以下建议，你可以快速制作一个药剂师(apothecary)。
首先，智力应该是你最高的能力值，其次是体质。(Constitution)。
其次，选择您的角色血统和背景。(ancestry) (background)
第三步，选择{@spell poison needle|SCGtD}和{@spell spare the dying}的零级咒语，以及1级咒语{@spell envenom|SCGtD}和{@spell healing word}。

entries.name: Apothecaries in Drakkenheim
entries: 在这个大陆上，一个广泛使用的与魔法相关的术语，用来描述许多职业和形式。
这个术语在整个大陆上都能找到，并且可能的研究领域范围非常广泛，而且不断扩大。
紫晶学院有药剂师部门负责管理他们的实验室和研究中心。
在他们众多的学校和据点中，他们教授先进的科学和使用魔法来更好地理解身体和心灵，以及可以与魔法结合的各种现代医疗实践，以拯救生命 — 或结束它们。
并非所有药剂师都是法师出身。这个广泛的术语已被用来描述几种将草药成分、化学物质和毒药与生物学研究相结合的实践，以达到类似于唤魔或死灵魔法效果的结果。
远在实验室中工作的病原体学家进行研究，创造出新的强大疾病和毒素品种。化学家们通过合适的化学剂量超越了魔法血统施法者的威力，实现了爆炸性和破坏性的效果。
其他与狂热变异效应一起工作的变异学家试图控制和隔离变异元素，并以更受控制的方式应用它们。
甚至有报告称，药剂师们正在研究解锁心灵潜能的技术。这些异能学家在贵族、法师和神职人员中引起了轰动，因为他们能够利用与魔法相似的心灵能力，而不需要法师血统。
秘密的复活者们追求对死亡和不死领域的可怕研究，他们凭借着新科学和发明来模仿死灵魔法。
在圣焰(`Sacred Flame`)的庇护下，有药剂师作为驱魔师工作，运用他们的神秘知识和研究来帮助清除圣地的不死生物，驱散不受欢迎的幽灵，并解除可怕的诅咒。
药剂师在每个大陆上都能找到；无论是天生的法师还是其他人，许多药剂师都是熟练的学者，他们有着敏锐的头脑，善于突破科学的界限。
这些研究人员已经走上了药剂师之路，为整个大陆的城市和城镇提供帮助，并偶尔在重大战争的战场上引入独特的化学战。
